anya-e0803n5:3_0: Vippakiṇṇakathā ettha, evaṁ vutte na hessati;
anya-e0803n5:7_0: Puriso, purisā. Purisaṁ, purise. Purisena, purisehi, purisebhi. Purisassa, purisānaṁ. Purisā, purisasmā, purisamhā, purisehi, purisebhi. Purisassa, purisānaṁ. Purise, purisasmiṁ, purisamhi, purisesu. Bho purisa, bhavanto purisā.
anya-e0803n5:8_0: Ayamāyasmatā mahākaccānena pabhinnapaṭisambhidena katasmā niruttipiṭakato uddharito purisaiccetassa pakatirūpassa nāmikapadamālānayo.
anya-e0803n5:8_1: Tatra purisavacanaekavacanaputhuvacanesu paccattavacanādīni bhavanti. Taṁ yathā? Puriso tiṭṭhati, purisā tiṭṭhanti.
anya-e0803n5:8_2: Tatra purisoti purisavacane ekavacane paccattavacanaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0803n5:9_1: Tatra purisanti purisavacane ekavacane upayogavacanaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0803n5:10_0: Purisena kataṁ, purisehi kataṁ, purisebhi kataṁ.
anya-e0803n5:10_1: Tatra purisenāti purisavacane ekavacane karaṇavacanaṁ bhavati, purisehi,
anya-e0803n5:11_1: Tatra purisassāti purisavacane ekavacane sampadānavacanaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0803n5:12_0: Purisā nissaṭaṁ, purisasmā nissaṭaṁ, purisamhā nissaṭaṁ, purisehi nissaṭaṁ, purisebhi nissaṭaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:12_1: Tatra purisāti purisavacane ekavacane nissakkavacanaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0803n5:12_2: Purisasmāti…pe… purisamhāti purisavacane ekavacane nissakkavacanaṁ bhavati, purisehi,
anya-e0803n5:13_1: Tatra purisassāti purisavacane ekavacane sāmivacanaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0803n5:14_0: Purise patiṭṭhitaṁ, purisasmiṁ patiṭṭhitaṁ, purisamhi patiṭṭhitaṁ, purisesu patiṭṭhitaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:14_1: Tatra puriseti purisavacane ekavacane bhummavacanaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0803n5:14_2: purisasminti…pe… purisamhīti…pe… purisesūti purisavacane puthuvacane bhummavacanaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0803n5:15_0: Bho purisa tiṭṭha, bhavanto purisā tiṭṭhatha.
anya-e0803n5:15_1: Tatra bho purisaiti purisavacane ekavacane ālapanaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0803n5:15_2: bhavanto purisāiti purisavacane puthuvacane ālapanaṁ bhavatīti iminā nayena sabbattha nayo vitthāretabbo.
anya-e0803n5:16_0: Yamakamahātherena katāya pana cūḷaniruttiyaṁ ‘‘bho purisa’’iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṁ vatvā ‘‘bho purisā’’iti dīghavasena ālapanabahuvacanaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:16_2: tathāpi bahūnamālapanavisaye ‘‘bho yakkhā’’itiādīnaṁ ālapanabahuvacanānaṁ jātakaṭṭhakathādīsu dissanato pasatthatarova hoti viññūnaṁ pamāṇañca,
anya-e0803n5:16_3: tasmā iminā yamakamahātheramatenapi ‘‘puriso purisā purisa’’ntiādīni vatvā āmantane ‘‘bho purisa, bho purisā,
anya-e0803n5:17_0: Tattha purisoti paṭhamāya ekavacanaṁ. Purisāti bahuvacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:17_2: Purisenāti tatiyāya ekavacanaṁ. Purisehi, purisebhīti dve bahuvacanāni.
anya-e0803n5:17_3: Purisassāti catutthiyā ekavacanaṁ. Purisānanti bahuvacanaṁ. Purisā, purisasmā,
anya-e0803n5:17_4: purisamhāti tīṇi pañcamiyā ekavacanāni. Purisehi, purisebhīti dve bahuvacanāni.
anya-e0803n5:17_5: Purisassāti chaṭṭhiyā ekavacanaṁ. Purisānanti bahuvacanaṁ. Purise, purisasmiṁ,
anya-e0803n5:17_6: purisamhīti tīṇi sattamiyā ekavacanāni. Purisesūti bahuvacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:17_7: Bho purisāti aṭṭhamiyā ekavacanaṁ. Bho purisā,
anya-e0803n5:18_4: tathāpi atthavasena asaṅkarabhāvo veditabbo. Kathaṁ? ‘‘Puriso tiṭṭhati, purisā tiṭṭhanti. Purisaṁ passati, purise passatī’’tiādinā.
anya-e0803n5:19_2: atha kho bahuvacanampi hotīti ‘‘bho purisā’’iti bahuvacanappayogopi gahito.
anya-e0803n5:19_3: ‘‘Bhavanto’’tidaṁ pana bahuvacanameva hotīti ‘‘purisā’’ti puna vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:19_4: Iti yamakamahātherena ‘‘bho purisa’’iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṁ vatvā ‘‘bho purisā’’iti dīghavasena ālapanabahuvacanaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:19_5: Tathā hi pāḷiyaṁ aṭṭhakathāsu ca nipātabhūto bhosaddo ekavacanabahuvacanavasena dvidhā bhijjati.
anya-e0803n5:19_6: Atrimāni nidassanapadāni – ‘‘api nu kho sapariggahānaṁ tevijjānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ apariggahena brahmunā saddhiṁ saṁsandati sametīti, no hidaṁ bho gotama. Acchariyaṁ bho ānanda, abbhutaṁ bho ānanda, ehi bho samaṇa,
anya-e0803n5:19_7: bho pabbajita’’iccādipāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca bhosaddassa ekavacanappayoge pavattinidassanaṁ, ‘‘tena hi bho mamapi suṇātha.
anya-e0803n5:19_8: Yathā mayameva arahāma taṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ,
anya-e0803n5:19_9: nāhaṁ bho samaṇassa gotamassa subhāsitaṁ subhāsitato nābbhanumodāmi, passatha bho imaṁ kulaputtaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:19_10: Bho yakkhā ahaṁ imaṁ tumhākaṁ bhājetvā dadeyyaṁ. Aparisuddho panamhi,
anya-e0803n5:19_11: bho dhuttā tumhākaṁ kriyā mayhaṁ na ruccati.
anya-e0803n5:19_12: So te purise āha bho tumhe maṁ mārentā rañño dassetvāva mārethā’’ti iccādi pana pāḷito aṭṭhakathāto ca bhosaddassa bahuvacanappayoge pavattinidassanaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:19_15: Taṁ yathā āgamehi na virujjhati, tathā gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:20_0: Keci pana adūraṭṭhassālapane ‘‘bho purisa’’iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṁ icchanti,
anya-e0803n5:20_1: dūraṭṭhassālapane pana ‘‘bho purisā’’iti dīghavasena ālapanekavacanaṁ icchanti.
anya-e0803n5:20_2: Adūraṭṭhānaṁ dūraṭṭhānañca purisānaṁ itthīnañca ālapane na kiñci vadanti.
anya-e0803n5:20_3: Tathā adūraṭṭhāya dūraṭṭhāya ca itthiyā ālapane te pucchitabbā ‘‘adūraṭṭhānaṁ dūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapane kathaṁ vattabba’’nti.
anya-e0803n5:20_4: Addhā te evaṁ puṭṭhā uttari kiñci vattuṁ na sakkhissanti.
anya-e0803n5:20_5: Evampi te ce vadeyyuṁ ‘‘bhavanto purisāti imināva adūraṭṭhānaṁ dūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapanaṁ bhavatī’’ti.
anya-e0803n5:20_6: Tadā te vattabbā ‘‘yadi bhavanto purisā’’ti iminā advejjhena vacanena adūraṭṭhānaṁ dūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapanaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0803n5:20_7: evaṁ sante ‘‘bho purisa’’iti rassapadenapi dūraṭṭhassa ca purisassālapanaṁ vattabbaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:20_8: evaṁ avatvā kimatthaṁ adūraṭṭhassālapane ‘‘bho purisa’’iti rassavasena ālapanekavacanaṁ icchatha,
anya-e0803n5:20_9: kimatthañca dūraṭṭhassālapane ‘‘bho purisā’’iti dīghavasena ālapanekavacanaṁ icchatha.
anya-e0803n5:21_1: taggha sugata bojjhaṅgā’’tiādīsu ālapanapadabhūtaṁ ‘‘bhagavā’’iti dīghapadaṁ samīpe ṭhitakālepi dūre ṭhitakālepi buddhassālapanapadaṁ bhavitumarahateva,
anya-e0803n5:21_3: Yasmā panetesu ‘‘bhagavā’’ti ālapanapadassa na katthacipi rassattaṁ dissati,
anya-e0803n5:21_4: ‘‘sugatā’’ti ālapanapadassa ca na katthacipi dīghattaṁ dissati,
anya-e0803n5:21_5: tasmā dīgharassamattābhedaṁ acintetvā ‘‘purisa’’iti rassavasena vuttapadaṁ pakatissaravasena samīpe ṭhitassa purisassa āmantanakāle adūraṭṭhassālapanapadaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0803n5:21_6: āyatassaravasena dūre ṭhitapurisassa āmantanakāle dūraṭṭhassālapanapadaṁ bhavatīti gahetabbaṁ. Tathā ‘‘bhavanto purisā, bho yakkhā,
anya-e0803n5:21_7: bho dhuttā’’tiādīni dīghavasena vuttāni ālapanabahuvacanapadānipi pakatissaravasena samīpe ṭhitapurisānaṁ āmantanakāle adūraṭṭhānamālapanapadāni bhavanti,
anya-e0803n5:21_8: āyatassaravasena dūre ṭhitapurisādīnaṁ āmantanakāle dūraṭṭhānamālapanapadāni bhavantīti gahetabbāni.
anya-e0803n5:21_9: Tathā hi brāhmaṇā katthaci katthaci rassaṭṭhānepi dīghaṭṭhānepi āyatena sarena majjhimāyatena sarena accāyatena ca sarena vedaṁ paṭhanti likhitumasakkuṇeyyena gītassarena viya.
anya-e0803n5:21_10: Iti sabbakkharesupi āyatena sarenuccāraṇaṁ labbhateva likhitumasakkuṇeyyaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:21_11: tasmā asampathamanotaritvā ‘‘bho purisa’’iti vacanena dūraṭṭhassa ca adūraṭṭhassa ca purisassālapanaṁ bhavati, ‘‘bho purisā,
anya-e0803n5:21_12: bhavanto purisā’’ti imehi vacanehipi dūraṭṭhānañca adūraṭṭhānañca purisānamālapanaṁ bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:21_13: Iti dūraṭṭhassa adūraṭṭhānañca āyatena sarena āmantanameva pamāṇaṁ, na dīgharassamattāviseso, tasmā ‘‘bho sattha, bho rāja, bho gaccha, bho muni, bho daṇḍi, bho bhikkhu, bho sayambhu, bhoti kaññe, bhoti patti, bhoti itthi, bhoti yāgu, bhoti vadhu, bho kula, bho aṭṭhi,
anya-e0803n5:21_14: bho cakkhu’’iccevamādīhi padehi adūraṭṭhassālapanañca dūraṭṭhassālapanañca bhavati. ‘‘Bhavanto satthā, satthāro, bhotiyo kaññā,
anya-e0803n5:21_15: kaññāyo’’ti evamādīhipi padehi adūraṭṭhānañcālapanaṁ bhavatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:23_0: Tassa taṁ vacanaṁ sutvā, rañño puttaṁ adassayuṁ;
anya-e0803n5:32_0: Na katthacipi dīghattaṁ, iti nīti mayā matā.
anya-e0803n5:33_0: Idampettha vattabbaṁ ‘‘kuto nu bho idamāyātaṁ ‘dūraṭṭhassālapanaṁ adūraṭṭhassālapanami’ti’’? Saddasatthato.
anya-e0803n5:33_1: Saddasatthaṁ nāma na sabbaso buddhavacanassopakārakaṁ, ekadesena pana hoti.
anya-e0803n5:34_0: Imasmiṁ pakaraṇe ‘‘bahuvacana’’nti vā ‘‘puthuvacana’’nti vā ‘‘anekavacana’’nti vā atthato ekaṁ, byañjanameva nānaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:34_1: tasmā sabbattha ‘‘bahuvacana’’nti vā ‘‘puthuvacana’’nti vā ‘‘anekavacana’’nti vā vohāro kātabbo,
anya-e0803n5:34_2: puthuvacanaṁ anekavacananti ca idaṁ sāsane niruttaññūnaṁ vohāro, itaraṁ saddasatthavidūnaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:35_0: Kasmā pana imasmiṁ pakaraṇe dvivacanaṁ na vuttanti?
anya-e0803n5:35_1: Yasmā buddhavacane dvivacanaṁ nāma natthi, tasmā na vuttanti.
anya-e0803n5:35_9: Teneva hi si yo aṁ yo nā hītiādinā ekavacanabahuvacanāneva dassitānīti.
anya-e0803n5:36_0: Nanu ca bho ‘‘suṇantu me āyasmantā, ajja uposatho pannaraso. Yadāyasmantānaṁ pattakallaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:36_1: mayaṁ aññamaññaṁ pārisuddhiuposathaṁ kareyyāmā’’ti pāḷiyaṁ dve sandhāya ‘‘āyasmantā’’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:36_2: ‘‘uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto cattāro pārājikā dhammā’’tiādīsu pana pāḷīsu bahavo sandhāya ‘‘āyasmanto’’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:36_3: na ca sakkā vattuṁ ‘‘yathā tathā vutta’’nti ,
anya-e0803n5:36_5: tiṇṇaṁ ārocentena ‘āyasmanto dhārentū’ti vattabba’’nti vuttattāti? Saccaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:36_6: taṁ pana vinayavohāravasena vuttanti. Nanu vinayo buddhavacanaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:36_7: kasmā ‘‘buddhavacane dvivacanaṁ nāma natthī’’ti vadathāti? Saccaṁ vinayo buddhavacanaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:36_13: Na hi akkharasamayakovido jhānalābhīpi dibbacakkhunā vassasatampi vassasahassampi samavekkhanto buddhavacane ekampi kriyāpadaṁ dvivacananti passeyya,
anya-e0803n5:36_14: evaṁ kriyāpadesu dvivacanassābhāvā nāmikapadesu dvivacanaṁ natthi.
anya-e0803n5:36_16: Sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ dvīsupi dvivacanāni santi, māgadhabhāsāyaṁ pana natthi.
anya-e0803n5:37_0: Apica ‘‘puthuvacana’’nti niruttivohāropi ‘‘buddhavacane dvivacanaṁ natthī’’ti etamatthaṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0803n5:37_1: Tañhi sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ vuttā dvivacanato bahuvacanato ca visuṁbhūtaṁ vacanaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:37_2: tattha vā vuttehi atthehi visuṁbhūtassa atthassa vacanaṁ ‘‘puthuvacana’’nti vuccati.
anya-e0803n5:37_3: Kathamidaṁ sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ vuttā dvivacanato bahuvacanato ca visuṁbhūtaṁ vacananti ce?
anya-e0803n5:37_5: tasmā idaṁ tehi sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ vuttehi dvivacanabahuvacanehi visuṁbhūtaatthassa vacananti vuccati.
anya-e0803n5:37_6: Kathañca pana sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ vuttehi visuṁbhūtassa atthassa vacananti puthuvacananti ce?
anya-e0803n5:37_7: Yasmā sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ dve upādāya dvivacanaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:37_9: bahavo pana upādāya bahuvacanaṁ vuttaṁ, na dve upādāya, ayaṁ sakkaṭabhāsāya viseso.
anya-e0803n5:37_10: Māgadhabhāsāyaṁ pana dviticatupañcādike bahavo upādāya puthuvacanaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:37_11: tasmā sakkaṭabhāsāyaṁ vuttehi atthehi visuṁbhūtassa atthassa vacananti puthuvacananti vuccati. Ayaṁ māgadhabhāsāya viseso. Tasmātra puthubhūtassa,
anya-e0803n5:37_12: puthuno vā atthassa vacanaṁ ‘‘puthuvacana’’nti attho samadhigantabbo.
anya-e0803n5:38_1: purisa’’nti niruttipiṭakato uddharitanayaṁ nissāya pakatirūpabhūtassa bhūtasaddassa nāmikapadamālā vuccate –
anya-e0803n5:39_0: Bhūto, bhūtā. Bhūtaṁ, bhūte. Bhūtena, bhūtehi, bhūtebhi. Bhūtassa, bhūtānaṁ. Bhūtā, bhūtasmā, bhūtamhā, bhūtehi, bhūtebhi. Bhūtassa, bhūtānaṁ. Bhūte, bhūtasmiṁ, bhūtamhi, bhūtesu. Bho bhūta, bhavanto bhūtā.
anya-e0803n5:40_1: Yathā panettha bhūtaiccetassa pakatirūpassa nāmikapadamālā purisanayena yojitā,
anya-e0803n5:40_2: evaṁ bhāvakādīnañca aññesañca taṁsadisānaṁ nāmikapadamālā purisanayena yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n5:40_3: Etthaññāni taṁsadisāni nāma ‘‘buddho’’tiādīnaṁ padānaṁ buddhaiccādīni pakatirūpāni.
anya-e0803n5:77_0: Kecettha vadeyyuṁ ‘‘nanu bho ‘orodhā ca kumārā cā’ti pāṭhassa dassanato orodhasaddo itthiliṅgo’’ti? Tanna,
anya-e0803n5:77_5: Nanu ca bho sammohavinodaniyādīsu orodhasaddassa itthiliṅgatā pākaṭā, kathanti ce?
anya-e0803n5:77_6: ‘‘Rukkhe adhivatthā devatā therassa kuddhā paṭhamameva manaṁ palobhetvā ‘ito te sattadivasamatthake upaṭṭhāko rājā marissatī’ti supine ārocesi.
anya-e0803n5:77_7: Thero taṁ kathaṁ sutvā rājorodhānaṁ ācikkhi.
anya-e0803n5:77_9: Ettha hi ‘‘rājorodhāna’’nti vatvā ‘‘tā’’ti vuttattāva orodhasaddassa itthiliṅgatā pākaṭāti? Tanna, atthassa duggahaṇato.
anya-e0803n5:77_11: ettha pana orodhasaddena itthipadatthassa kathanato itthipadatthaṁ sandhāya ‘‘tā’’ti vuttattā ‘‘tā itthiyo’’ti ayamevattho.
anya-e0803n5:77_12: Tumhe pana amātāpitarasaṁvaddhattā ācariyakule ca anivuṭṭhattā etaṁ sukhumatthamajānantā yaṁ vā taṁ vā mukhārūḷhaṁ vadatha.
anya-e0803n5:78_0: Bhuñjanatthaṁ kathanatthaṁ, mukhaṁ hotīti no vade;
anya-e0803n5:79_0: Yaṁ vā taṁ vā mukhārūḷhaṁ, vacanaṁ paṇḍito naroti.
anya-e0803n5:80_0: Na mayaṁbho yaṁ vā taṁ vā mukhārūḷhaṁ vadāma,
anya-e0803n5:80_3: na mayaṁ tumhākaṁ saddahāmāti. Amhākaṁ saddahatha vā mā vā,
anya-e0803n5:80_4: mā tumhe ‘‘aṭṭhakathācariyānaññeva vacanaṁ gahetvā vadāmā’’ti aṭṭhakathācariye abbhācikkhatha.
anya-e0803n5:80_7: na yuttaṁ buddhādīnaṁ garūnamabbhācikkhanaṁ mahato anatthassa lābhāya saṁvattanato.
anya-e0803n5:80_8: Vuttañhetaṁ bhagavatā ‘‘attanā duggahitena amhe ceva abbhācikkhati, bahuñca apuññaṁ pasavati, tato attānañca khaṇatī’’ti.
anya-e0803n5:81_0: Evaṁ abbhācikkhanassa ayuttataṁ sāvajjatañca dassetvā punapi te idaṁ vattabbā – jātakaṭṭhakathāyampi tumhehi āhaṭaudāharaṇasadisaṁ udāharaṇamatthi, taṁ suṇātha.
anya-e0803n5:81_1: Kosiyajātakaṭṭhakathāyañhi ‘‘satthā jetavane viharanto ekaṁ sāvatthiyaṁ mātugāmaṁ ārabbha kathesi.
anya-e0803n5:81_2: Sā kirekassa saddhassa pasannassa upāsakabrāhmaṇassa brāhmaṇī dussīlā pāpadhammā’’ti pāṭho dissati.
anya-e0803n5:81_3: Ettha hi ‘‘mātugāmaṁ ārabbha kathesī’’ti vatvā ‘‘sā’’ti vuttattā tumhākaṁ matena mātugāmasaddo itthiliṅgoyeva siyā, na pulliṅgo,
anya-e0803n5:81_6: kiṁ sā eva aṭṭhakathā tumhākaṁ paṭisaraṇaṁ, na tadaññāti.
anya-e0803n5:82_2: Evaṁ vuttā te niruttarā appaṭibhānā maṅkubhūtā pattakkhandhā adhomukhā pajjhāyeyyuṁ.
anya-e0803n5:82_3: Etthāpi mātugāmasaddena itthipadatthassa kathanato itthipadatthaṁ sandhāya ‘‘sā’’ti vuttattā ‘‘sā itthī’’ti ayamevattho.
anya-e0803n5:82_4: Katthaci hi padhānavācakena pulliṅgena napuṁsakaliṅgena vā samānādhikaraṇassa guṇasaddassa abhidheyyaliṅgānuvattittāpulliṅgavasena vā napuṁsakaliṅgavasena vā niddisitabbattepi liṅgamanapekkhitvā itthipadatthamevāpekkhitvā itthiliṅganiddeso dissati. Taṁ yathā?
anya-e0803n5:82_5: ‘‘Idha visākhe mātugāmo susaṁvihitakammantā hoti saṅgahitaparijanā bhattumanāpaṁ carati,
anya-e0803n5:82_7: ‘‘ko nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo,
anya-e0803n5:82_8: yena midhekacco mātugāmo dubbaṇṇā ca hoti durūpā supāpikā dassanāya,
anya-e0803n5:82_9: daliddā ca hoti appassakā appabhogā appesakkhā ca.
anya-e0803n5:82_10: Idha mallike ekacco mātugāmo kodhanā hoti upāyāsabahulā,
anya-e0803n5:82_11: appampi vuttā samānā abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patitthiyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukarotī’’ti ca,
anya-e0803n5:82_12: ‘‘taṁ kho pana bhikkhave itthiratanaṁ rañño cakkavattissa pubbuṭṭhāyinī pacchānipātinī kiṁkārapaṭissāvinī’’ti ca ime payogā.
anya-e0803n5:83_0: Katthaci pana padhānavācakena napuṁsakaliṅgena samānādhikaraṇassa guṇasaddassa abhidheyyaliṅgānuvattittā napuṁsakaliṅgavasena niddisitabbattepi liṅgamanapekkhitvā purisapadatthamevāpekkhitvā pulliṅganiddeso dissati. Taṁ yathā?
anya-e0803n5:83_1: ‘‘Pañca paccekabuddhasatāni imasmiṁ isigilismiṁ pabbate ciranivāsino ahesuṁ.
anya-e0803n5:83_2: Taṁ kho pana rañño cakkavattissa pariṇāyakaratanaṁ ñātānaṁ pavesetā aññātānaṁ nivāretā’’ti.
anya-e0803n5:83_3: Katthaci padhānavācakena liṅgattayena samānādhikaraṇassa guṇasaddassa abhidheyyaliṅgānurūpaṁ niddeso dissati. Taṁ yathā?
anya-e0803n5:83_5: Aṭṭhahi kho nakulamāte dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo kāyassa bhedā parammaraṇā manāpakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati. Saddho purisapuggalo, saddhaṁ kulaṁ, cittaṁ dantaṁ sukhāvaha’’nti.
anya-e0803n5:84_0: Seyyaiti saddo pana yebhuyyena okārantabhāve ṭhatvā liṅgattayānukūlo bhavati ekākāreneva tiṭṭhanato. Kathaṁ? Seyyo amitto matiyā upeto. Esāva pūjanā seyyo, ekāhaṁ jīvitaṁ seyyo.
anya-e0803n5:89_0: Yaso ca appabuddhīnaṁ, viññūnaṁ ayaso ca yo;
anya-e0803n5:90_0: Ayasova seyyo viññūnaṁ, na yaso appabuddhinaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:91_0: Dummedhehi pasaṁsā ca, viññūhi garahā ca yā;
anya-e0803n5:94_0: Pavivekaṁ dukkhaṁ seyyo, yañce kāmamayaṁ sukhaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:96_0: Maraṇaṁ dhammikaṁ seyyo, yañce jīve adhammika’’nti.
anya-e0803n5:97_0: Evamayaṁ seyya iti saddo okārantabhāve ṭhatvā liṅgattayānukūlo bhavati.
anya-e0803n5:97_1: Katthaci pana ākārantabhāve ṭhatvā itthiliṅgānukūlo dissati ‘‘itthīpi hi ekacciyā, seyyā posa janādhipā’’ti.
anya-e0803n5:97_3: Evaṁpakāre payoge kiṁ tumhe na passathāti.
anya-e0803n5:97_4: Evaṁ vuttā ca te niruttarāva bhavissanti.
anya-e0803n5:98_0: Sacepi te ettha evaṁ vadeyyuṁ ‘‘tattha tattha suttappadese aṭṭhakathādīsu ca ‘mātugāmo’ti vā ‘mātugāmenā’ti vā okārantapulliṅgabhāvena mātugāmasaddassa dassanato pulliṅgabhūtaṁ mātugāmasaddaṁ anapekkhitvā itthipadatthameva apekkhitvā ‘‘sā itthī’’ti itthīsaddena sāsaddassa sambandhaggahaṇaṁ mayaṁ sampaṭicchāma,
anya-e0803n5:98_1: ‘orodho’ti vā ‘orodhenā’ti vā okārantapulliṅgabhāvena ṭhitassa orodhasaddassa adassanato pana tumhehi vuttaṁ purimatthaṁ na sampaṭicchāmā’’ti.
anya-e0803n5:98_2: Tadā tesaṁ imāni vinayapāḷiyaṁ āgatapadāni dassetabbāni ‘‘tena kho pana samayena rājā udeno uyyāne paricāresi saddhiṁ orodhena,
anya-e0803n5:98_3: atha kho rañño udenassa orodho rājānaṁ udenaṁ etadavocā’’ti.
anya-e0803n5:98_4: Evaṁ imāni suttapadāni dassetvā suttanipātaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘rāmo nāma rājā kuṭṭharogī orodhehi ca nāṭakehi ca jigucchamāno’’ti vacanañca dassetvā ‘‘gacchatha tumhe garukulamupagantvā bhagavato saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitatthaṁ sādhukaṁ padabyañjanāni uggaṇhathā’’ti uyyojetabbā.
anya-e0803n5:99_0: Idāni mātugāmasaddādīsu kiñci vinicchayaṁ vadāma – mātugāmasaddo ca orodhasaddo ca dārasaddo cāti ime itthipadatthavācakāpi samānā ekantena pulliṅgā bhavanti.
anya-e0803n5:99_1: Tesu dārasaddassa ekasmiṁ atthe vattamānassāpi bahuvacanakattameva saddasatthavidū icchanti, na ekavacanakattaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:99_2: Mayaṁ pana dārasaddassa ekasmiṁ atthe ekavacanakattaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:99_5: Pāḷiyañhi dārasaddo yebhuyyena bahuvacanako bhavati, ekavacanako appo. Tatrime payogā –
anya-e0803n5:101_0: Puttā ca dārā ca mayañca sabbe;
anya-e0803n5:103_0: Tasmā hi amhaṁ daharā na miyyare’’ti ca,
anya-e0803n5:105_0: Sahasā sampiyāyena, taṁ jaññāvasalo itī’’ti ca,
anya-e0803n5:107_0: Dissati paradāresu, taṁ parābhavato mukha’’nti ca,
anya-e0803n5:108_0: ‘‘Puttesu dāresu ca yā apekkhā’’ti ca byāse,
anya-e0803n5:108_2: puttadārehi mattano’’ti ca evamādayo bahuvacanappayogā bahavo bhavanti.
anya-e0803n5:111_0: Dhammena dāraṁ posenti, te namassāmi mātalī’’ti ca,
anya-e0803n5:113_0: ‘‘Yo icche puriso hotuṁ, jātiṁ jātiṁ punappunaṁ;
anya-e0803n5:116_0: Samāhāralakkhaṇavasena panesa dārasaddo napuṁsakaliṅgekavacanopi katthaci bhavati. ‘‘Ādāya puttadāraṁ.
anya-e0803n5:116_1: Puttadārassa saṅgaho’’iti evaṁ idha vuttappakārena liṅgañca atthañca sallakkhetvā ‘‘puriso purisā’’ti pavattaṁ purisasaddanayaṁ nissāya sabbesaṁ ‘‘bhūto bhāvako bhavo’’tiādīnaṁ bhūdhātumayānaṁ aññesañcokārantapadānaṁ nāmikapadamālāsu saddhāsampannehi kulaputtehi saddhammaṭṭhitiyā kosallamuppādetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:117_0: Kiṁ pana sabbāni okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbappakārena ekasadisāneva hutvā paviṭṭhānīti? Na paviṭṭhāni.
anya-e0803n5:117_1: Kānici hi okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhāni ca honti, ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca,
anya-e0803n5:117_2: kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca honti, ekadesena na paviṭṭhāni ca,
anya-e0803n5:117_4: Tatra katamāni kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhāni ca honti, ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca? ‘‘Saro vayo ceto’’tiādīni.
anya-e0803n5:117_5: Saroiti hi ayaṁsaddo ususaddasaravanaakārādisaravācako ce, purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭho. Rahadavācako ce,
anya-e0803n5:117_7: Vayoiti saddo parihānivācako ce, purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭho. Āyukoṭṭhāsavācako ce,
anya-e0803n5:117_9: Ceto iti saddo yadi paṇṇattivācako, purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭho. Yadi pana cittavācako,
anya-e0803n5:117_10: manogaṇapakkhikattā purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭho. Manogaṇo ca nāma –
anya-e0803n5:123_0: Idāni yathāvuttassa pākaṭīkaraṇatthaṁ manasaddādīnaṁ nāmikapadamālaṁ kathayāma –
anya-e0803n5:124_0: Mano , manā. Manaṁ, mano, mane. Manasā, manena, manehi, manebhi. Manaso, manassa, manānaṁ. Manā, manasmā, manamhā, manehi, manebhi. Manaso, manassa, manānaṁ. Manasi, mane, manasmiṁ, manamhi, manesu. Bho mana, bhavanto manā.
anya-e0803n5:125_0: Atha vā ‘‘bho manā’’iti bahuvacanampi ñeyyaṁ. Evaṁ vaco, vacā. Vacaṁ, vaco, vace.
anya-e0803n5:125_2: Ahasaddassa pana bhummekavacanaṭṭhāne ahasi, ahe, ahasmiṁ, ahamhi, ahu, ahanīti yojetabbā.
anya-e0803n5:126_0: Idāni rūpantaravisesadassanatthaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgassa manasaddassapi nāmikapadamālaṁ vadāma,
anya-e0803n5:127_0: Manaṁ, manāni, manā. Manaṁ, manāni, mane. Manena, manehi, manebhi. Manassa, manaso, manānaṁ. Manā, manasmā, manamhā, manehi, manebhi. Manassa, manaso, manānaṁ. Mane, manasmiṁ, manamhi, manesu. Bho mana, bhavanto manā. Atha vā ‘‘bho manāni,
anya-e0803n5:127_1: bho manā’’evampi bahuvacanaṁ veditabbaṁ. Evamuttaratrāpi nayo.
anya-e0803n5:128_0: Ettha ca pulliṅgassa manasaddassa paccattakaraṇasampadānasāmibhummavacanāni mano manasā manaso manasīti rūpāni ṭhapetvā yāni sesāni,
anya-e0803n5:128_1: napuṁsakaliṅgassa ca manasaddassa paccattavacanāni ‘‘manaṁ manānī’’ti rūpāni ca,
anya-e0803n5:128_2: aṭṭhamyopayogavacanānaṁ ‘‘manaṁ manānī’’ti rūpadvayañca ṭhapetvā yāni sesāni,
anya-e0803n5:129_0: Keci okāranto manoiti saddo napuṁsakaliṅgoti vadanti,
anya-e0803n5:129_1: te vattabbā – yadi so napuṁsakaliṅgo siyā,
anya-e0803n5:129_6: mano dukkho’’ti ca ‘‘nicco vā anicco vāti anicco bhante’’ti ca evamādayo pulliṅgappayogā bahavo diṭṭhā.
anya-e0803n5:129_9: ‘‘anicco dukkho’’ti evamādīni taṁsamānādhikaraṇāni anekapadasatānipi napuṁsakaliṅgāneva siyuṁ. Na hi tāni napuṁsakaliṅgāni,
anya-e0803n5:129_15: tathāpi manogaṇe pamukhabhāvena gahitassokārantassa manasaddassa rūpaṁ na hoti. Atha kiñcarahīti ce?
anya-e0803n5:129_16: Cittasaddena samānaliṅgassa samānasutittepi manogaṇe apariyāpannassa niggahītantasseva manasaddassa rūpaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:129_17: Manasaddo hi punnapuṁsakavasena dvidhā bhijjati ‘‘mano manaṁ’’iti yathā ‘‘ajjavoajjava’’nti. ‘‘Mano ce nappadussati.
anya-e0803n5:129_18: Santaṁ tassa manaṁ hotī’’ti hi pāḷi.
anya-e0803n5:129_19: Yadi ca so manosaddo napuṁsakaliṅgo na hoti.
anya-e0803n5:134_0: Ettha manosaddena samānādhikaraṇo ‘‘patita’’nti saddo napuṁsakaliṅgabhāvena kasmā sannihito.
anya-e0803n5:134_2: tasmā saddantarasannidhānavasena manosaddo napuṁsakaliṅgoti ñāyatīti? Tanna,
anya-e0803n5:134_4: Yadi hi samānādhikaraṇapadaṁ sabbattha liṅgavisesaṁ joteyya,
anya-e0803n5:134_5: ‘‘cattāro indriyānī’’ti etthāpi ‘‘cattāro’’ti padaṁ indriyasaddassa pulliṅgattaṁ kareyya, na ca kātuṁ sakkoti.
anya-e0803n5:134_7: Yadi tumhe ‘‘patita’’nti samānādhikaraṇapadaṁ nissāya manosaddassa napuṁsakaliṅgattamicchatha,
anya-e0803n5:134_8: ‘‘cattāro indriyānī’’ti etthapi ‘‘cattāro’’ti samānādhikaraṇapadaṁ nissāya indriyasaddassa pulliṅgattaṁ icchathāti.
anya-e0803n5:134_9: Na mayaṁ bho indriyasaddassa pulliṅgattaṁ icchāma,
anya-e0803n5:134_13: Yadi evaṁ ‘‘patitaṁ asubhesu munissa mano’’ti etthāpi ‘‘patita’’nti padaṁ liṅgavipallāsavasena ṭhitanti mantvā ‘‘patito’’ti atthaṁ dhārethāti.
anya-e0803n5:134_19: tena ñāyati ‘‘manosaddo napuṁsakaliṅgo’’ti. Mā tumhe evaṁ vadetha,
anya-e0803n5:134_20: samānādhikaraṇapadaṁ nāma katthaci padhānaliṅgamanuvattati, katthaci nānuvattati,
anya-e0803n5:134_21: tasmā na taṁ liṅgavisesajotane ekantato pamāṇaṁ. ‘‘Mātugāmo, orodho, āvuso visākha, ehi visākhe,
anya-e0803n5:134_25: Yasmā evamādīsupi ṭhānesu liṅgavavatthānaṁ hotiyeva. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0803n5:134_27: tasmā ‘‘patitaṁ asubhesu munissa mano’’ti etthāpi ‘‘patita’’nti napuṁsakaliṅgaṁ ‘‘mano’’ti pulliṅganti vavatthānaṁ bhavatīti.
anya-e0803n5:134_29: Tato tesaṁ tuṇhībhūtānaṁ idaṁ vattabbaṁ – yasmā manogaṇe pavattānaṁ padānaṁ samānādhikaraṇapadāni katthaci napuṁsakavasena yojetabbāni,
anya-e0803n5:134_30: tasmā manogaṇe pamukhassa manosaddassapi samānādhikaraṇapadāni katthaci napuṁsakavasena yojitāni.
anya-e0803n5:134_35: appakaṁ rāgādi rajo yesaṁ paññāmaye akkhimhi te apparajakkhā’’tiādinā saddaracanaṁ kubbiṁsu,
anya-e0803n5:134_36: na pana tehi vaco siro rajosaddādīnaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgattaṁ vibhāvetuṁ īdisī saddaracanā katā,
anya-e0803n5:134_37: atha kho siromanosaddānaṁ manogaṇe pavattānaṁ pulliṅgasaddānaṁ katthacipi īdisānipi liṅgavipallāsavasena ṭhitāni samānādhikaraṇapadāni hontīti paresaṁ jānāpanādhippāyavatiyā anukampāya viracitā.
anya-e0803n5:134_38: Etthāpi tumhākaṁ matena manosaddassa napuṁsakaliṅgatte sati vaco siro iccādayopi napuṁsakaliṅgattamāpajjanti napuṁsakaliṅgavasena samānādhikaraṇapadānaṁ niddiṭṭhattā.
anya-e0803n5:134_40: Addhā te idampi sutvā nibbeṭhetumasakkontā tuṇhī bhavissanti.
anya-e0803n5:134_41: Kiñcāpi te aññaṁ gahetabbakāraṇaṁ apassantā evaṁ vadeyyuṁ ‘‘yadi bho mano saddo napuṁsakaliṅgona hoti,
anya-e0803n5:134_43: Te vattabbā – yadi tumhe veyyākaraṇamataṁ gahetvā manosaddassa napuṁsakaliṅgattaṁ rocetha,
anya-e0803n5:134_44: nanu bhagavāyeva loke asadiso mahāveyyākaraṇo mahāpuriso visārado parappavādamaddano.
anya-e0803n5:134_45: Bhagavantañhi padakā veyyākaraṇā ambaṭṭhamāṇavapokkharasātisoṇadaṇḍādayo ca brāhmaṇā saccakanigaṇṭhādayo ca paribbājakā vādena na sampāpuṇiṁsu,
anya-e0803n5:134_46: aññadatthu bhagavāyeva mattavāraṇagaṇamajjhe kesarasīho viya asambhīto nesaṁ nesaṁ vādaṁ maddesi,
anya-e0803n5:134_48: evaṁvidhena bhagavatā vohārakusalena yasmā ‘‘kāyo anicco’’ti ca ‘‘kāyo dukkho, mano anicco,
anya-e0803n5:134_49: mano dukkho’’ti ca evamādinā vuttā manosaddassa pulliṅgabhāvasūcanikā bahū pāḷiyo dissanti,
anya-e0803n5:134_51: Evaṁ vuttā te niruttarā appaṭibhānā maṅkubhūtā pattakkhandhā adhomukhā pajjhāyissanti.
anya-e0803n5:136_0: Saro, sarā. Saraṁ, sare. Sarena, sarehi, sarebhi. Sarassa, sarānaṁ. Sarā, sarasmā, saramhā, sarehi, sarebhi. Sarassa, sarānaṁ. Sare, sarasmiṁ, saramhi, saresu. Bho sara, bhavanto sarā.
anya-e0803n5:137_0: Ayaṁ purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhassa ususaddasaravanaakārādisaravācakassa sarasaddassa nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n5:138_0: Ayaṁ pana purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhassa manogaṇapakkhikassa rahadavācakassa sarasaddassa nāmikapadamālā –
anya-e0803n5:139_0: Saro, sarā. Saraṁ, saro, sare. Sarasā, sarena, sarehi, sarebhi. Saraso, sarassa, sarānaṁ. Sarā, sarasmā, saramhā, sarehi, sarebhi. Saraso, sarassa, sarānaṁ. Sarasi, sare, sarasmiṁ, saramhi, saresu. Bho sara, bhavanto sarā, bho sarā iti vā.
anya-e0803n5:140_0: Vayo, vayā. Vayaṁ, vaye. Vayena, vayehi,
anya-e0803n5:140_2: Ayaṁ purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhassa parihānivācakassa vayasaddassa nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n5:141_0: Ayaṁ pana purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhassa manogaṇapakkhikassa āyukoṭṭhāsavācakassa vayasaddassa nāmikapadamālā – vayo, vayā. Vayaṁ, vayo, vaye. Vayasā, vayena, vayehi, vayebhīti mananayena ñeyyo. Tassa ceto paṭissosi, araññe luddagocaro. Cetā haniṁsu vedabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:142_0: Ceto, cetā. Cetaṁ, cete. Cetena, cetehi, cetebhīti purisanayena ñeyyo.
anya-e0803n5:142_1: Ayaṁ purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhassa paṇṇattivācakassa cetasaddassa nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n5:143_0: Ayaṁ pana purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhassa cittavācakassa cetasaddassa nāmikapadamālā – ceto, cetā. Cetaṁ, ceto, cete. Cetasā, cetena, cetehi, cetebhīti mananayena ñeyyo. Yaso kulaputto, yasaṁ kulaputtaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:143_3: Evaṁ kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbathā paviṭṭhāni ca honti,
anya-e0803n5:143_4: ekadesena paviṭṭhāni cāti iminā nayena sabbapadāni paññācakkhunā upaparikkhitvā viseso veditabbo.
anya-e0803n5:143_5: Avisesaññuno hi evamādivibhāgaṁ ajānantā yaṁ vā taṁ vā byañjanaṁ ropentā yathādhippetaṁ atthaṁ virādhenti,
anya-e0803n5:143_6: tasmā yo ettha amhehi pakāsito vibhāgo,
anya-e0803n5:143_8: Katamāni kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca ekadesena na paviṭṭhāni ca?
anya-e0803n5:143_9: Mano vaco tejosaddādayo ceva ayyasaddo ca,
anya-e0803n5:144_3: bhavanto ayyo’’ti dve bahuvacanāni ca vattabbāni.
anya-e0803n5:144_4: Ettha ayyo iti saddo paccattavacanabhāve ekavacanaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:144_6: Tatrime payogā ‘‘ayyo kira sāgato ambatitthikena nāgena saṅgāmesi,
anya-e0803n5:144_7: pivatu bhante ayyo sāgato kāpotikaṁ pasanna’’nti evamādīni ayyosaddassa paccattekavacanappayogāni,
anya-e0803n5:144_8: ‘‘atha kho sā itthī taṁ purisaṁ etadavoca ‘nāyyo so bhikkhu maṁ nippāṭesi,
anya-e0803n5:144_9: apica ahameva tena bhikkhunā gacchāmi, akārako so bhikkhu,
anya-e0803n5:144_10: gaccha khamāpehī’ti’’ evamādīni ayyosaddassa ālapanekavacanappayogāni, ‘‘etha’yyo rājavasatiṁ, nisīditvā suṇātha me.
anya-e0803n5:144_11: Etha mayaṁ ayyo samaṇesu sakyaputtiyesu pabbajissāmā’’ti evamādīni ayyosaddassa ālapanabahuvacanappayogāni. Bhavati catra –
anya-e0803n5:145_0: Ayyo iti ayaṁ saddo, paccattekavaco bhave;
anya-e0803n5:147_0: Evaṁ kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhāni ca honti ekadesena na paviṭṭhāni ca.
anya-e0803n5:148_0: Katamāni kānici okārantapadāni purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhāni? Gosaddoyeva.
anya-e0803n5:149_0: Go, gāvo, gavo. Gāvuṁ, gāvaṁ, gavaṁ, gāvo, gavo. Gāvena, gavena, gohi, gobhi. Gāvassa, gavassa, gavaṁ, gunnaṁ, gonaṁ. Gāvā, gāvasmā, gāvamhā, gavā, gavasmā, gavamhā, gohi, gobhi. Gāvassa, gavassa, gavaṁ, gunnaṁ, gonaṁ. Gāve, gāvasmiṁ, gāvamhi, gave, gavasmiṁ , gavamhi, gāvesu, gavesu, gosu. Bho go, bhavanto gāvo, gavo.
anya-e0803n5:149_1: Ayaṁ purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhassa gosaddassa nāmikapadamālā.
anya-e0803n5:150_0: Nanu ca bho gosaddo attanā sambhūtagoṇasaddamālāvasena purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭho ceva ekadesena na paviṭṭho cāti? Saccaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:150_1: Goṇasaddo gosaddavasena sambhūtopi ‘‘vatticchānupubbikā saddapaṭipattī’’ti vacanato gosaddato visuṁ amhehi gahetvā purisanaye pakkhitto.
anya-e0803n5:150_2: Tassa hi visuṁ gahaṇe yutti dissati syādīsu ekākāreneva tiṭṭhanato,
anya-e0803n5:150_3: tasmā gosaddato sambhūtampi goṇasaddaṁ anapekkhitvā suddhaṁ gosaddameva gahetvā purisanaye sabbathā gosaddassa appaviṭṭhatā vuttā.
anya-e0803n5:151_0: Nanu ca bho paccattavacanabhūto goiti saddo purisoti saddena sadisattā purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhoti? Tanna, gosaddo hi niccamokāranto,
anya-e0803n5:151_1: na purisasaddādayo viya paṭhamaṁ akārantabhāve ṭhatvā pacchā paṭiladdhokārantaṭṭho.
anya-e0803n5:151_2: Teneva hi paccattavacanaṭṭhānepi ālapanavacanaṭṭhānepi goicceva tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0803n5:151_3: Yadi paccattavacanattaṁ paṭicca gosaddassa purisanaye ekadesena paviṭṭhatā icchitabbā,
anya-e0803n5:151_4: ‘‘kānici okārantapadānī’’ti evaṁ vuttā okārantakathā kamatthaṁ dīpeyya, nipphalāva sā kathā siyā,
anya-e0803n5:151_5: tasmā amhehi yathāvutto nayoyeva āyasmantehi manasi kātabbo.
anya-e0803n5:151_6: Evaṁ gosaddassa purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0803n5:152_0: Kecettha evaṁ puccheyyuṁ ‘‘gosaddassa tāva ‘go, gāvo, gavo. Gāvuṁ, gāvaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:152_1: gavaṁ’ iccādinā nayena purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā amhehi ñātā,
anya-e0803n5:152_2: jaraggava puṅgavādisaddā pana kutra naye paviṭṭhā’’ti?
anya-e0803n5:152_3: Tesaṁ evaṁ byākātabbaṁ ‘‘jaraggava puṅgavādisaddā sabbathāpi purisanaye paviṭṭhā’’ti.
anya-e0803n5:152_4: Tathā hi tesaṁ gosaddato ayaṁ viseso,
anya-e0803n5:152_5: jaranto ca so go cāti jaraggavo.
anya-e0803n5:152_6: Ettha nakāralopo takārassa ca gakārattaṁ bhavati samāsapadattā,
anya-e0803n5:152_7: samāse ca simhi pare gosaddassokārassa avādeso labbhati,
anya-e0803n5:152_9: Tathā hi aññattha anupapadattā gavoiti bahuvacanapadaṁyeva dissati.
anya-e0803n5:152_10: Idha pana sopapadattā samāsapadabhāvamāgamma ‘‘jaraggavo’’ti ekavacanapadaṁyeva dissati.
anya-e0803n5:152_11: Tathā hi jaraggavoti ettha jarantā ca te gavo cāti evaṁ bahuvacanavasena nibbacanīyatā na labbhati lokasaṅketavasena ekasmiṁ atthe nirūḷhattāti. ‘‘Jaraggavo, jaraggavā. Jaraggavaṁ, jaraggave.
anya-e0803n5:153_0: Tatra puṅgavoti gunnaṁ yūthapati nisabhasaṅkhāto usabho.
anya-e0803n5:153_2: samehi pādehi phusī vasundhara’’nti ca ‘‘gavañce taramānānaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:153_4: Īdisesu pana ṭhānesu keci ‘‘pumā ca so go cāti puṅgavo’’ti vacanatthaṁ bhaṇanti.
anya-e0803n5:153_5: Mayaṁ pana padhāne nirūḷho ayaṁ saddoti vacanatthaṁ na bhaṇāma.
anya-e0803n5:153_6: Na hi puṅkokilotiādisaddānaṁ kokilādīnaṁ pumbhāvappakāsanamatte samatthatā viya imassa pumbhāvappakāsanamatte samatthatā sambhavati,
anya-e0803n5:153_7: atha kho padhānabhāvappakāsane ca samatthatā sambhavati.
anya-e0803n5:153_8: Tena ‘‘sakyapuṅgavo’’tiādīsu nisabhasaṅkhāto puṅgavo viyāti puṅgavo, sakyānaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:153_9: sakyesu vā puṅgavo sakyapuṅgavotiādinā samāsapadattho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n5:153_10: Atha vā uttarapadatte ṭhitānaṁ sīhabyagghanāgādisaddānaṁ seṭṭhavācakattā ‘‘sakyapuṅgavo’’tiādīnaṁ ‘‘sakyaseṭṭho’’tiādinā attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n5:153_11: Iti sabbathāpi purisanaye pavattanato jaraggava puṅgavādisaddānaṁ gosaddassa padamālato visadisapadamālatā vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0803n5:153_12: Gosaddassa pana purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā ca vavatthapetabbā.
anya-e0803n5:154_1: tasmā taṁmatena tassa purisanaye sabbathā appaviṭṭhatā bhavati.
anya-e0803n5:154_2: ‘‘Aṅguttarāpesū’’ti pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘mahiyā pana nadiyā uttarena āpo’’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:154_3: ṭīkāyaṁ pana taṁ ulliṅgitvā ‘‘mahiyā nadiyā āpo tassa janapadassa uttarena honti,
anya-e0803n5:154_4: tāsaṁ avidūrattā so janapado uttarāpo’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:154_5: Evaṁ āpasaddassa ekantena itthiliṅgatā bahuvacanatā ca ācariyehi icchitā,
anya-e0803n5:154_6: tesaṁ mate āpoiti itthiliṅge paṭhamābahuvacanarūpe honte dutiyātatiyāpañcamīsattamīnaṁ bahuvacanarūpāni kīdisāni siyuṁ. Tathā hi ‘‘purise,
anya-e0803n5:154_7: purisehi purisebhi purisesū’’ti rūpavato pulliṅgassa viya okārantitthiliṅgassa ekāraehi kārādiyuttāni rūpāni katthacipi na dissanti.
anya-e0803n5:154_8: Ato tesaṁ mate padamālānayo atīva dukkaro.
anya-e0803n5:157_0: Iccāpasaddassa itthiliṅgabahuvacanantatā veyyākaraṇānaṁ mataṁ nissāya anumatāti veditabbā.
anya-e0803n5:157_1: Aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ pana āpo iti saddassa napuṁsakaliṅgekavacanavasena vutto payogo diṭṭho ‘‘omattaṁ pana āpo adhimattapathavīgatikaṁ jāta’’nti.
anya-e0803n5:157_3: Tathā hi ‘‘suciṁ sugandhaṁ salilaṁ, āpo tatthābhisandatī’’ti.
anya-e0803n5:157_4: Imasmiṁ padese āpo iti saddo ekavacanaṭṭhāne ṭhito diṭṭho.
anya-e0803n5:157_5: Kecettha vadeyyuṁ ‘‘āpoti saṅkhaṁ gataṁ salilaṁ suci sugandhaṁ hutvā tattha abhisandatīti salilaṁsaddavasena ekavacanappayogo kato, na nāmasaddavasena.
anya-e0803n5:157_6: Āpasaddo hi ekantenitthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacananto ca.
anya-e0803n5:157_7: Tathā hi ‘āpo tatthābhisandantī’ti bahuvacanavasena tappayogo vattabbopi chandānurakkhaṇatthaṁ vacanavipallāsavasena niddiṭṭho’’ti. Tanna,
anya-e0803n5:157_8: ‘‘āpo tatthābhisandare’’ti vattuṁ sakkuṇeyyattā ‘‘tāni ajja padissare’’ti bahuvacanappayogā viya. Yasmā evaṁ na vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:157_9: yasmā ca pana pāḷiyaṁ ‘‘āpo labbhati, tejo labbhati,
anya-e0803n5:158_0: Athāpi ce vadeyyuṁ – nanu pāḷiyaṁyeva tassa bahuvacanantatā paccakkhato diṭṭhā ‘‘āpo ca devā pathavī ca, tejo vāyo tadāgamu’’nti? Tampi na.
anya-e0803n5:158_1: Ettha hi ‘‘devā’’ti saddaṁ apekkhitvā ‘‘āgamu’’nti bahuvacanappayogo kato, na ‘‘āpo’’ti saddaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:158_2: Yadi ‘‘āpo’’ti saddaṁ sandhāya bahuvacanappayogo kato siyā,
anya-e0803n5:158_3: ‘‘pathavī’’ti ‘‘tejo’’ti ‘‘vāyo’’ti ca saddampi sandhāya bahuvacanappayogo kato siyā .
anya-e0803n5:158_4: Evaṁ sante pathavī tejo vāyosaddāpi bahuvacanakabhāvamāpajjeyyuṁ, na pana āpajjanti. Na hete bahuvacanakā, atha kho ekavacanakā eva.
anya-e0803n5:158_5: Rūḷhīvasena te pavattā pakatiāpādīsu atthesu appavattanato.
anya-e0803n5:158_6: Tathā hi āpokasiṇādīsu parikammaṁ katvā nibbattā devā ārammaṇavasena ‘‘āpo’’tiādināmaṁ labhantīti.
anya-e0803n5:158_7: Evaṁ vuttāpi te evaṁ vadeyyuṁ ‘‘nanu ca bho ‘aṅguttarāpesū’ti bahuvacanapāḷi dissatī’’ti?
anya-e0803n5:158_10: ‘‘aṅguttarāpesū’’ti bahuvacanaṁ pana ‘‘kurūsu aṅgesu aṅgānaṁ magadhāna’’ntiādīni bahuvacanāni viya rūḷhīvasena ekassāpi janapadassa vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:158_13: pulliṅgabahuvacanena pana vutto janapadasaṅkhāto atthoyeva padhāno ‘‘āgatasamaṇo saṅghārāmo’’ti ettha samaṇasaṅkhātaṁ atthaṁ upasajjanakaṁ katvā pavattassa āgatasamaṇasaddassa saṅghārāmasaṅkhāto attho viya,
anya-e0803n5:158_14: tasmā āpasaṅkhātaṁ atthaṁ gahetvā yo aṅguttarāpo nāma janapado,
anya-e0803n5:158_16: Tathā hi ‘‘aṅguttarāpesu viharati āpaṇaṁ nāma aṅgānaṁ nigamo’’ti pāḷi dissati.
anya-e0803n5:158_17: Tattha uttarena mahāmahiyā nadiyā āpo yesaṁ te uttarāpā,
anya-e0803n5:158_18: aṅgā ca te uttarāpā cāti aṅguttarāpā, tesu aṅguttarāpesu.
anya-e0803n5:158_19: Evaṁ ekasmiṁ janapadeyeva bahuvacanaṁ na āpasaṅkhāte atthe,
anya-e0803n5:159_0: Tathāpi ye evaṁ vadanti ‘‘āpasaddo itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanakocā’’ti.
anya-e0803n5:159_1: Te pucchitabbā ‘‘kiṁ paṭicca tumhe āyasmanto ‘āpasaddo itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanako cā’ti vadathā’’ti ?
anya-e0803n5:159_2: Te evaṁ puṭṭhā evaṁ vadeyyuṁ – ‘‘aṅgāyeva so janapado,
anya-e0803n5:159_4: tāsaṁ avidūrattā uttarāpoti vuccatī’’ti ca ‘‘mahiyā pana nadiyā āpo tassa janapadassa uttarena honti,
anya-e0803n5:159_5: tāsaṁ avidūrattā so janapado uttarāpoti vuccatī’’ti ca evaṁ pubbācariyehi abhisaṅkhato saddaracanāviseso dissati,
anya-e0803n5:159_6: tasmā itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanako cā’’ti vadāmāti. Saccaṁ dissati,
anya-e0803n5:159_7: so pana saddasatthe veyyākaraṇānaṁ mataṁ gahetvā abhisaṅkhato,
anya-e0803n5:159_8: saddasatthañca nāma na sabbathā buddhavacanassopakārakaṁ, ekadesena pana hoti,
anya-e0803n5:160_2: Āpasaddato paṭhamāyovacanaṁ katvā tassokārādesañca katvā āpoti padaṁ sijjhati ‘‘gāvo’’ti padamivāti. Visamamidaṁ nidassanaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:160_4: Tathā hi yomhi pare gosaddantassāvādesaṁ katvā tato yonamokārādesaṁ katvā ‘‘gāvo’’ti nipphajjati,
anya-e0803n5:160_5: āpasadde pana dve ādesā na santi.
anya-e0803n5:160_6: Buddhavacanañhi patvā āpasaddo akārantatāpakatiko jāto, na aññathāpakatikoti.
anya-e0803n5:161_2: ‘‘na vacanapaccanīkasātena suvijānaṁ subhāsita’’nti evaṁ vuttapaccanīkasātabhāve ca ṭhatvā evaṁ vadeyyuṁ ‘‘yatheva gāvosaddo,
anya-e0803n5:161_3: tatheva āposaddo kiṁ itthiliṅgo na bhavissati bahuvacanako cā’’ti?
anya-e0803n5:161_4: Tato tesaṁ imāni suttapadāni dassetabbāni. Seyyathidaṁ? ‘‘Āpaṁ āpato sañjānāti,
anya-e0803n5:161_5: āpaṁ āpato saññatvā āpaṁ maññati, āpasmiṁ maññati, āpaṁ meti maññati,
anya-e0803n5:161_6: āpaṁ abhinandatī’’ti evaṁ suttapadāni dassetvā ‘‘āpanti idaṁ kataravacana’’nti pucchitabbā.
anya-e0803n5:161_7: Addhā te āpasaddassa bahuvacanantabhāvameva icchamānā vakkhanti ‘‘dutiyābahuvacana’’nti.
anya-e0803n5:161_9: Te vadeyyuṁ ‘‘yovacanaṁ kataamādesattā na suyyatī’’ti. Yaṁ yaṁ bhonto icchanti, taṁ taṁ mukhārūḷhaṁ vadanti.
anya-e0803n5:162_1: ‘‘Āpato’’ti idampi ‘‘bahuvacanakaṁ topaccayanta’’nti vadāma topaccayassa ekatthe ca bavhatthe ca pavattanato.
anya-e0803n5:162_2: Iti tumhe bahuvacanakattaṁyeva icchamānā ‘‘āposaddo ca yovacananto’’ti bhaṇatha,
anya-e0803n5:162_4: ‘‘āpasmiṁ maññatī’’ti ettha pana ‘‘āpasmi’’ntidaṁ kataravacanantaṁ katarādesena sambhūtanti?
anya-e0803n5:162_5: Addhā te evaṁ puṭṭhā niruttarā bhavissanti.
anya-e0803n5:162_6: Tathā yesaṁ evaṁ hoti ‘‘āpasaddo itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanako cā’’ti,
anya-e0803n5:162_7: te pucchitabbā ‘‘yaṁ ācariyehi veyyākaraṇamataṁ gahetvā ‘yā āpo’ti ca ‘tāsa’nti ca vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:162_8: tattha ‘kiṁ tāsa’nti vacane ‘āpāna’nti padaṁ ānetvā attho vattabbo, udāhu āpassā’’ti?
anya-e0803n5:162_10: evañca sati ‘‘yā āpā’’ti vattabbaṁ ‘‘yā kaññā tiṭṭhantī’’ti padamiva.
anya-e0803n5:162_13: evaṁ sati ‘‘tāsa’’nti etthāpi ‘‘āpassā’’ti padaṁ ānetvā attho veditabbo. Kasmāti ce?
anya-e0803n5:162_14: Yasmā ‘‘āpo’’ti paccattekavacanassa tumhākaṁ matena bahuvacanatte sati ‘‘āpassā’’ti padampi bahuvacananti katvā tāsaṁsaddena yojetvā vattuṁ yuttitoti.
anya-e0803n5:162_15: Evaṁ sati ‘‘āpāna’’nti padassa abhāveneva bhavitabbaṁ. Yathā pana ‘‘puriso, purisā. Purisaṁ, purise’’ti ca, ‘‘go, gāvo, gavo.
anya-e0803n5:162_16: Gāvu’’nti ca ekavacanabahuvacanāni bhavanti, evaṁ ‘‘āpo, āpā. Āpaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:162_18: Evañca sati ‘‘āpasaddo bahuvacanakoyeva hotī’’ti na vattabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:163_1: tesaṁ vacanaṁ sadosaṁ duppariharaṇīyaṁ mūlapariyāyasutte ‘‘āpaṁ maññati āpasmi’’nti ekavacanapāḷīnaṁ dassanato,
anya-e0803n5:163_2: visuddhimaggādīsu ca ‘‘vissandanabhāvena taṁ taṁ ṭhānaṁ āpoti appotīti āpo’’tiādikassa ekavacanavasena vuttanibbacanassa dassanato.
anya-e0803n5:163_3: Yathā pana pāḷiyaṁ itthiliṅgepi pariyāpanno gosaddo ‘‘tā gāvo tato tato daṇḍena ākoṭeyyā’’ti ca ‘‘annadā baladā cetā’’ti ca ādinā bavhatthadīpakehi itthiliṅgabhūtehi sabbanāmikapadehi ca asabbanāmikapadehi ca samānādhikaraṇabhāvena vutto dissati,
anya-e0803n5:163_4: na tathā pāḷiyaṁ bavhatthadīpakehi itthiliṅgabhūtehi sabbanāmikapadehi vā asabbanāmikapadehi vā samānādhikaraṇabhāvena vutto āpasaddo dissati.
anya-e0803n5:163_6: kaññasaddato āpaccayo viya āpasaddato āpaccayo vā siyā,
anya-e0803n5:163_7: nadasaddato viya ca īpaccayo vā siyā, ubhayampi natthi,
anya-e0803n5:163_8: ubhayābhāvato itthiliṅge vuttaṁ sabbampi vidhānaṁ tattha na labbhati,
anya-e0803n5:163_10: Nanu ca bho gosaddatopi āpaccayo natthi,
anya-e0803n5:163_12: evaṁ sante kasmā soyeva itthiliṅgo hoti, na panāyaṁ āpasaddoti?
anya-e0803n5:164_0: Ettha vuccate – gosaddo na niyogā itthiliṅgo, atha kho pulliṅgova.
anya-e0803n5:164_1: Itthiliṅgabhāve pana tamhā āpaccaye ahontepi īpaccayo vikappena hoti,
anya-e0803n5:164_4: gāvī’’tiādinā attano itthiliṅgarūpānaṁ nibbattikāraṇabhūto, tena so itthiliṅgo bhavati.
anya-e0803n5:164_7: Yathā vā gosaddassa avisadākāravohārataṁ paṭicca itthiliṅgabhāvo upapajjati, na tathā āpasaddassa.
anya-e0803n5:164_8: Āpasaddassa hi anākularūpakkamattā avisadākāravohāratā na dissati, yāya eso itthiliṅgo siyā.
anya-e0803n5:165_0: Tathā yesaṁ evaṁ hoti ‘‘āpasaddo sabbadā itthiliṅgo ceva bahuvacanako cā’’ti,
anya-e0803n5:165_1: te vattabbā – yathā itthiliṅgabhūtassa kaññāsaddassa paṭhamaṁ kaññaiti rassavasena ṭhapitassa āpaccayato paraṁ smiṁvacanaṁ sarūpato na tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0803n5:165_2: yaṁbhāvena ca yābhāvena ca tiṭṭhati ‘‘kaññāyaṁ, kaññāyā’’ti,
anya-e0803n5:165_3: na tathā ‘‘itthiliṅga’’nti tumhehi gahitassa āposaddassa paṭhamaṁ āpaiti rassavasena ṭhapitassa paraṁ smiṁvacanaṁ yaṁbhāvena ca yābhāvena ca tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0803n5:165_7: Yasmā ca smiṁvacanaṁ sarūpato tiṭṭhati, tasmā āpasaddo na itthiliṅgo.
anya-e0803n5:165_8: Na hi caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassasaṅgahesu anekakoṭisatasahassesu pāḷippadesesu ekasmimpi pāḷippadese paṭhamaṁ akārantabhāvena ṭhapetabbānaṁ itthiliṅgasaddānaṁ parato ṭhitaṁ smiṁvacanaṁ sarūpato tiṭṭhatīti.
anya-e0803n5:166_1: tathā hi aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ ‘omattaṁ pana āpo adhimattapathavīgatikaṁ jāta’nti napuṁsakaliṅgabhāvena taṁsamānādhikaraṇapadāni niddiṭṭhānī’’ti? Tanna,
anya-e0803n5:166_2: manogaṇe pavattehi tama vaca sirasaddādīhi viya āpasaddenapi samānādhikaraṇapadānaṁ katthaci napuṁsakaliṅgabhāvena niddisitabbattā.
anya-e0803n5:166_4: veneyyasattahadayesu tamo payātī’’ti ettha ‘‘tamo’’tipadena samānādhikaraṇaṁ ‘‘vihata’’nti napuṁsakaliṅgaṁ dissati,
anya-e0803n5:166_5: tathā ‘‘dukkhaṁ vaco etasmiṁ vipaccanīkasāte puggaleti dubbaco’’ti ettha ‘‘vaco’’ti padena samānādhikaraṇaṁ ‘‘dukkha’’nti napuṁsakaliṅgaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:166_6: ‘‘avanataṁ siro yassa so avanatasiro’’ti ettha ‘‘siro’’ti padena samānādhikaraṇaṁ ‘‘avanata’’nti napuṁsakaliṅgaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:166_7: ‘‘appaṁ rāgādirajo yesaṁ paññāmaye akkhimhi te apparajakkhā’’ti ettha ‘‘rajo’’ti padena samānādhikaraṇaṁ ‘‘appa’’nti napuṁsakaliṅgaṁ dissati.
anya-e0803n5:166_8: Na te ācariyā tehi samānādhikaraṇapadehi tamavacasirasaddādīnaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgattaviññāpanatthaṁ tathāvidhaṁ saddaracanaṁ kubbiṁsu,
anya-e0803n5:166_9: atha kho ‘‘sobhanaṁ mano tassāti sumano’’ti ettha viya manogaṇe pavattapulliṅgānaṁ payoge napuṁsakaliṅgabhāvenapi samānādhikaraṇapadāni katthaci hontīti dassanatthaṁ kubbiṁsu.
anya-e0803n5:166_10: Yathā ca ‘‘vihata’’ntiādikā saddaracanā tamavacasirasaddādīnaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgattaviññāpanatthaṁ na katā,
anya-e0803n5:166_11: tathā ‘‘omatta’’nti ca ‘‘adhimattapathavīgatikaṁ jāta’’nti ca saddaracanāpi āpasaddassa napuṁsakaliṅgattaviññāpanatthaṁ na katā.
anya-e0803n5:166_12: Yasmā pana manogaṇe pavattehi manasaddādīhi ekadesena samānagatikattā āpasaddenapi napuṁsakaliṅgassa samānādhikaraṇatā yujjati,
anya-e0803n5:166_13: tasmā aṭṭhasāliniyaṁ ‘‘omattaṁ pana āpo adhimattapathavīgatikaṁ jāta’’nti napuṁsakaliṅgassa āpasaddena samānādhikaraṇatā katā.
anya-e0803n5:166_14: Tathāpi āpasaddo manasaddādīhi ekadesena samānagatiko samāsapadatte majjhokārassa ‘‘āpokasiṇaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:166_16: tasmā ‘‘omatta’’ntiādivacanaṁ āpasaddassa napuṁsakaliṅgattaviññāpanatthaṁ vuttanti na gahetabbaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:166_17: liṅgavipariyayavasena pana katthaci evampi saddagati hotīti ñāpanatthaṁ vuttanti gahetabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:166_20: sanikārāni’ssa paccattopayogarūpāni buddhavacanādīsu vijjeyyuṁ, na tādisāni santi.
anya-e0803n5:166_21: Kiñci bhiyyo – okārantaṁ nāma napuṁsakaliṅgaṁ katthacipi natthi,
anya-e0803n5:166_25: Iccokārantavasena gahitassa āpasaddassa itthiliṅgatā ca napuṁsakaliṅgatā ca ekantato natthi,
anya-e0803n5:166_26: niggahītantavasena pana gahitassa katthaci napuṁsakaliṅgatā siyā ‘‘bhante nāgasena samuddo samuddoti vuccati,
anya-e0803n5:166_27: kena kāraṇena āpaṁ udakaṁ samuddoti vuccatī’’ti payogadassanato.
anya-e0803n5:166_28: Ettha paneke vadeyyuṁ ‘‘yadi bho okārantavasena gahitassa āpasaddassa itthinapuṁsakaliṅgavasena dviliṅgatā natthi,
anya-e0803n5:166_29: okāranto āpasaddo kataraliṅgo’’ti? Pulliṅgoti mayaṁ vadāmāti.
anya-e0803n5:167_2: nijjhānakkhamatā ca bhaveyya, tathā suttaṁ āharathāti. ‘‘Āharissāmisuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:167_3: na no suttāharaṇe bhāro atthī’’ti evañca pana vatvā tesaṁ imāni suttapadāni dassetabbāni. Seyyathidaṁ? ‘‘Āpo upalabbhatīti? Āmantā.
anya-e0803n5:167_4: Āpassa kattā kāretā upalabbhatīti? Na hevaṁ vattabbe. Atīto āpo atthīti? Āmantā.
anya-e0803n5:167_5: Tena āpena āpakaraṇīyaṁ karotīti? Na hevaṁ vattabbe.
anya-e0803n5:167_6: Āpaṁ maññati āpasmiṁ maññatī’’ti imāni suttapadāni.
anya-e0803n5:168_2: Ekavacanatāyeva hi saddasatthe paṭisiddhā, na bahuvacanatā,
anya-e0803n5:168_3: tena ‘‘āpenā’’ti iminā pana āpasaddassa itthiliṅgabhāvavigamo siddho itthiliṅge enādesābhāvato. ‘‘Āpassa,
anya-e0803n5:168_4: āpasmi’’nti imināpi itthiliṅgabhāvavigamoyeva itthiliṅge sarūpato nā smā smiṁ vacanānamabhāvā.
anya-e0803n5:169_1: rūpānī’’tiādīni viya sanikārānaṁ rūpānaṁ adassanato okārantabhāvena gahitassa napuṁsakaliṅgabhāvavigamo atīva pākaṭo.
anya-e0803n5:169_3: Āmantā’’ti ettha ‘‘atīto’’ti iminā āpasaddassa visadākāravohāratāsūcakena okārantapadena tassa avisadākāravohāratāya ca ubhayamuttākāravohāratāya ca abhāvo siddho.
anya-e0803n5:169_4: Tassa ca avisadākāravohāratāya abhāve siddhe itthiliṅgabhāvo dūrataro.
anya-e0803n5:169_5: Ubhayamuttākāravohāratāya ca abhāve siddhe napuṁsakaliṅgabhāvopi dūrataroyeva.
anya-e0803n5:169_6: Iti na katthacipi okārantabhāvena gahito āpasaddo itthiliṅgo vā napuṁsakaliṅgo vā bhavati.
anya-e0803n5:169_7: Milindapañhe pana niggahītantavasena āgato napuṁsakaliṅgoti veditabbo,
anya-e0803n5:169_8: na cettha vattabbaṁ ‘‘atīto’’ti ‘‘tenā’’ti ca imāni liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttānīti vāccaliṅgānamanuvattāpakassa abhidheyyaliṅgabhūtassa āpasaddassa ‘‘kaññāya cittānī’’tiādīnaṁ viya itthinapuṁsakaliṅgarūpānaṁ abhāvato.
anya-e0803n5:169_10: tehiyeva uttamapurisehi vohārakusalehi ‘‘atīto āpo’’tiādinā vuttattāpi ‘‘atīto’’ti ‘‘tenā’’ti ca imāni liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttānīti na cintetabbāni,
anya-e0803n5:169_11: tasmā taṁsamānādhikaraṇo okārantabhāvena gahito āpasaddo ekavacananto pulliṅgo ceva yathāpayogaṁ ekavacanabahuvacanako cāti veditabbo ‘‘āpo, āpā. Āpaṁ, āpe’’tiādinā yojetabbattā.
anya-e0803n5:169_12: Evaṁ vuttāni suttapadāni savinicchayāni sutvā addhā te āpasaddassa itthiliṅgabahuvacanatāvādino niruttarā bhavissanti.
anya-e0803n5:170_0: Ettha koci vadeyya – pāḷiyaṁ pulliṅganayo ekavacananayo ca kiṁ aṭṭhakathāṭīkācariyehi na diṭṭho,
anya-e0803n5:170_1: ye āpasaddassa itthiliṅgabahuvacanattaṁ vaṇṇesunti? No na diṭṭho, diṭṭhoyeva so nayo tehi.
anya-e0803n5:170_2: Yasmā pana te na kevalaṁ sāṭṭhakathe tepiṭake buddhavacaneyeva visāradā,
anya-e0803n5:170_5: ‘‘saddasatthe ca īdiso nayo vutto’’ti viññāpetuñca saddasatthanayaṁ gahetvā āpasaddassa itthiliṅgabahuvacanakattaṁ vaṇṇesunti natthi tesaṁ doso.
anya-e0803n5:170_6: Tathā hi mūlapariyāyasuttantaṭṭhakathāyaṁ tehiyeva vuttaṁ āpasaddassa pulliṅgekavacanakattasūcanakaṁ ‘‘lakkhaṇasasambhārārammaṇasammutivasena catubbidho āpo, tesū’’tiādi, tasmā natthi tesaṁ doso. Pūjārahā hi te āyasmanto, namoyeva tesaṁ karoma,
anya-e0803n5:170_8: Ye pana ujuvipaccanīkavādā daḷhameva āpasaddassa itthiliṅgabahuvacanattaṁ mamāyanti,
anya-e0803n5:170_10: Yasmā pana mayaṁ pāḷinayānusārena antadvayavato āpasaddassa pulliṅgattaṁ napuṁsakaliṅgattañca vidadhāma,
anya-e0803n5:170_11: tasmā yo koci idaṁ vādaṁ madditvā aññaṁ vādaṁ patiṭṭhāpetuṁ sakkhissatīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati,
anya-e0803n5:170_14: Sabbamidañhi vacanaṁ tesu tesu ṭhānesu atthabyañjanapariggahaṇe sotūnaṁ paramakosallajananatthañceva sāsane ādaraṁ akatvā saddasatthamatena kālaṁ vītināmentānaṁ sāthalikānaṁ pamādavihāranisedhanatthañca sāsanassātimahantabhāvadīpanatthañca vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:170_15: na attukkaṁsanaparavambhanatthanti imissaṁ nītiyaṁ saddhāsampannehi kulaputtehi yogo karaṇīyo bhagavato sāsanassa ciraṭṭhitatthaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:171_0: Yasmā pana pāḷito aṭṭhakathā balavatī nāma natthi,
anya-e0803n5:171_1: tasmā pāḷinayānurūpeneva āpasaddassa nāmikapadamālaṁ yojessāma sotūnamasammohatthaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:171_3: Atrāyaṁ udānapāḷi ‘‘kiṁ kayirā udapānena, āpā ce sabbadā siyu’’nti.
anya-e0803n5:172_0: Āpo, āpā. Āpaṁ, āpe. Āpena, āpehi, āpebhi. Āpassa, āpānaṁ. Āpā, āpasmā, āpamhā, āpehi, āpebhi. Āpassa, āpānaṁ. Āpe, āpasmiṁ, āpamhi, āpesu. Bho āpa, bhavanto āpā.
anya-e0803n5:173_0: Sabbanāmādīhipi yojessāma – yo āpo, ye āpā. Yaṁ āpaṁ, ye āpe. Yena āpena, sesaṁ neyyaṁ , so āpo, te āpā. Atīto āpo, atītā āpā. Sesaṁ neyyaṁ. Iccevaṁ –
anya-e0803n5:175_0: Na sabbathāva gosaddo, purisena samo mato.
anya-e0803n5:177_0: Sarādī ekadesena, sabbathā vā samā matā.
anya-e0803n5:189_0: Atra tassatthassa sādhakāni payogāni sāsanato ca lokato ca yathārahamāharitvā dassessāma – manasā ce pasannena, bhāsati vā karoti vā. Na mayhaṁ manaso piyo. Sādhukaṁ manasi karotha. Manopubbaṅgamā dhammā. Manoramaṁ, manodhātu, manomayena kāyena, iddhiyā upasaṅkami. Yo ve ‘‘dassa’’nti vatvāna, adāne kurute mano. Vacasā paricitā. Vacaso vacasi.
anya-e0803n5:193_0: Esa bhiyyo pasīdāmi, sutvāna munino vaco.
anya-e0803n5:194_0: Sakhā ca mitto ca mamāsi sīvika,
anya-e0803n5:194_1: susikkhito sādhu karohi me vaco. Ekūnatiṁso vayasā subhadda. Vayaso, vayasi, vayovuddho, vayoguṇā anupubbaṁ jahanti. Jalantamiva tejasā. Tejaso, tejasi, tejodhātukusalo. Tejokasiṇaṁ. Tapasā uttamo, tapaso, tapasi, tapodhano, tapojigucchā.
anya-e0803n5:194_3: tapo idha krubbasi brahmapattiyā. Cetasā aññāsi,
anya-e0803n5:194_5: etamatthaṁ cetasi sannidhāya, cetoparivitakkamaññāya. Cetopariyañāṇaṁ, ceto paricchindati,
anya-e0803n5:194_6: so parasattānaṁ parapuggalānaṁ cetasā ceto paricca jānāti. Tamasā, tamaso, tamasi, tamonudo, tamoharo. Navāhametaṁ yasasā dadāmi. Yasaso, yasasi, yaso bhogasamappito.
anya-e0803n5:194_7: Yasoladdhākho panasmākaṁ bhogā. Yasodharā devī, yaso laddhā na majjeyya. Ayasāva malaṁ samuṭṭhitaṁ. Ayaso, ayasi, ayopākārapariyantaṁ, ayasā paṭikujjitaṁ. Seyyo ayoguḷo bhutto, ayopatto , ayomayaṁ, ayo kantatīti ayokanto.
anya-e0803n5:194_9: sādhu khalu payaso pānaṁ yaññadattena, payasi ojā, payodharā, payonidhi.
anya-e0803n5:194_10: Sahassanetto sirasā paṭiggahi. Siraso, sirasi añjaliṁ katvā, vanditabbaṁ isiddhajaṁ. Siroruhā, siro chindati. Yo kāme parivajjeti, sappasseva padāsiro. Siro te vajjhayitvāna. Sarasā, saraso, tīṇi uppalajātāni, tasmiṁ sarasi brāhmaṇa. Saroruhaṁ. Yaṁ etā upasevanti, chandasāvā dhanenavā. Sāvittī chandaso mukhaṁ. Chandasi, chandoviciti, chandobhaṅgo, urasā panudahissāmi, uraso, urasi jāyati, urasilomo, uromajjhe vijjhi. Rahasā, rahaso, rahasi, rahogato nisīditvā, evaṁ cintesahaṁ tadā. Ahasā, ahasi. Jāyanti tattha pārohā,
anya-e0803n5:194_11: ahorattānamaccayeti imāni payogāni. Ettha ca ‘‘manena, manassa, mane, manasmiṁ,
anya-e0803n5:194_12: manamhī’’tiādīni ca ‘‘manaāyatanaṁ tamaparāyano ayapatto chandahānī’’tiādīni ca ‘‘na manaṁ aññāsi. Yasaṁ laddhāna dummedho.
anya-e0803n5:194_13: ‘‘Siraṁ chindatī’’tiādīni ca rūpāni manogaṇabhāvappakāsakāni na hontīti na dassitāni, na alabbhamānavasena,
anya-e0803n5:194_14: tasmātra imā ādito paṭṭhāya manogaṇabhāvavibhāvinī gāthāyo bhavanti –
anya-e0803n5:207_0: ‘‘Vaco sutvā, siro chindi, ayo kantati’’ iccapi;
anya-e0803n5:212_0: Sā so syantāni rūpāni, sandissanti manogaṇe;
anya-e0803n5:214_1: Evaṁ manogaṇalakkhaṇaṁ anākulaṁ niggumbaṁ nijjaṭaṁ samuddiṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:224_2: Tesaṁ rūpāni bhavanti – bilasā, bilaso, bilasi, bilagato, bilaṁ pāvisi. Padasāva agamāsi, tīṇi padavārāni, mākāsi mukhasā pāpaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:224_3: mukhagataṁ bhojanaṁ chaḍḍāpeti. Saccena danto damasā upeto.
anya-e0803n5:224_4: Rasavaraṁ rasamayaṁ rasaṁ pivīti. Idaṁ manogaṇādikalakkhaṇaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:227_0: Nā sa smiṁvisaye sāso-syantā pana na hontihi.
anya-e0803n5:232_2: Tesaṁ rūpāni bhavanti – āpodhātu, vāyodhātu, āpokasiṇaṁ, vāyokasiṇaṁ, āpomayaṁ, vāyomayaṁ, jīva tvaṁ saradosataṁ, saradakālo. Āpena, āpassa, āpe, āpasmiṁ, āpamhi. Vāyena, vāyassa, vāye, vāyasmiṁ, vāyamhi. Saradena, saradassa, sarade, saradasmiṁ, saradamhi. Āpaṁ āpato sañjānāti. Vāyaṁ vāyato sañjānāti. Saradaṁ pattheti, saradaṁ ramaṇīyā nadī.
anya-e0803n5:233_0: Keci panettha vadeyyuṁ ‘‘nanu sāsane vāyasaddo viya vāyusaddopi manogaṇādīsu icchitabbo’’ti? Ettha vuccate –
anya-e0803n5:240_0: Yathā hi āyusaddassa, rūpaṁ dissati sāgamaṁ;
anya-e0803n5:242_0: Na tathā vāyusaddassa, rūpaṁ dissati sāgamaṁ;
anya-e0803n5:244_0: Tathā hi ‘‘vāyati iti, vāyo’’ iti garū vaduṁ;
anya-e0803n5:246_0: Yattha pathavī ca āpo ca, tejo vāyo na gādhati;
anya-e0803n5:248_1: Ettha manogaṇādikā dvidhā bhijjanti bila padādito āpādito ca.
anya-e0803n5:248_2: Evaṁ manogaṇādikalakkhaṇaṁ anākulaṁ niggumbaṁ nijjaṭaṁ samuddiṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:250_0: Ye ca nāvisaye sontā, ye ca smāvisaye siyuṁ;
anya-e0803n5:252_2: Etesu hi atthasaddādīnaṁ nāvacanaṭṭhāne ‘‘atthaso byañjanaso akkharaso suttaso upāyaso sabbaso ṭhānaso’’tiādīni sontāni rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n5:252_3: Dīghorasaddānaṁ pana smāvacanaṭṭhāne ‘‘dīghaso oraso’’ti sontāni rūpāni bhavanti. Idaṁ amanogaṇalakkhaṇaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:254_0: Sabbathā vinimuttā ye, sā so syantādibhāvato;
anya-e0803n5:256_2: Evaṁ amanogaṇalakkhaṇaṁ anākulaṁ niggumbaṁ nijjaṭaṁ samuddiṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:257_0: Evaṁ dassitesu manogaṇalakkhaṇādīsu koci vadeyya ‘‘yadidaṁ tumhehi vuttaṁ ‘ye samāsādibhāvamhi,
anya-e0803n5:257_2: tena ‘‘parosataṁ gomayaṁ godhano’’iccādīsu goparasaddādayopi manogaṇādikabhāvaṁ āpajjantīti? Nāpajjanti. Kasmāti ce? Yasmā –
anya-e0803n5:262_2: Iccevaṁ manogaṇavibhāvanāyaṁ manogaṇo manogaṇādiko amanogaṇo cāti tidhā bhedo veditabbo.
anya-e0803n5:263_0: Tattha manogaṇe pariyāpannasaddānaṁ samāsaṁ patvā ‘‘abyaggamanaso naro, thiracetasaṁ kulaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:263_1: saddheyyavacasā upāsikātiādinā liṅgattayavasena aññathāpi rūpāni bhavanti.
anya-e0803n5:263_2: Ettha pana keci evaṁ vadanti ‘‘yadā manasaddo sakatthe avattitvā ‘abyaggo mano yassa soyaṁ abyaggamanaso,
anya-e0803n5:263_3: alīno mano yassa soyaṁ alīnamanaso’ti evaṁ aññatthe vattati,
anya-e0803n5:263_4: tadā purisanayeneva nāmikapadamālā labbhati, na manogaṇanayenā’’ti.
anya-e0803n5:263_5: Taṁ na gahetabbaṁ ubhinnampi yathārahaṁ labbhanato.
anya-e0803n5:263_10: Evaṁ vadantā ca te abyaggamanasaddādīnaṁ abyaggamanasaiccādinā sakārantapakatibhāvena ṭhapetabbabhāvaṁ vibbhantamativasena cintetvā sabbāsu vibhattīsu,
anya-e0803n5:263_11: dvīsu ca vacanesu purisanayena yojetabbataṁ maññanti.
anya-e0803n5:263_14: aññāniyeva anabhimatāni rūpāni siyuṁ. Yasmā siyuṁ,
anya-e0803n5:263_15: tasmā evaṁ aggahetvā ayaṁ viseso gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n5:264_0: Yattha hi samāsavasena manasaddo cetasaddādayo ca sakatthe avattitvā aññatthe vattanti,
anya-e0803n5:264_1: tattha sakārāgamānaṁ padānaṁ nāmikapadamālā purisanayena ca manogaṇe mananayena ca yathārahaṁ labbhati.
anya-e0803n5:264_3: Yattha pana samāsavisayeyeva manādisaddā sakatthe vattanti,
anya-e0803n5:264_4: tattha nissakārāgamānaṁ nāmikapadamālā purisanayena ca manogaṇe mananayena ca labbhati.
anya-e0803n5:265_1: saddagatīsu ca viññūnaṁ kosalluppādanatthaṁ yathāvuttānaṁ padānaṁ padamālā tidhā katvā dassayissāma – ‘‘byāsatto mano yassa soyaṁ byāsattamanaso naro’’ti evamaccantaṁ puggalāpekkhakassa imassa padassa –
anya-e0803n5:266_0: Byāsattamanaso naro, byāsattamanasā narā. Byāsattamanasaṁ naraṁ, byāsattamanase nare. Byāsattamanasā, byāsattamanena narena, byāsattamanehi, byāsattamanebhi narehi. Byāsattamanaso, byāsattamanassa narassa, byāsattamanānaṁ narānaṁ. Byāsattamanā, byāsattamanasmā, byāsattamanamhā narā, byāsattamanehi, byāsattamanebhi narehi. Byāsattamanaso, byāsattamanassa narassa, byāsattamanānaṁ narānaṁ. Byāsattamanasi, byāsattamane, byāsattamanasmiṁ, byāsattamanamhi nare, byāsattamanesu naresu. Bho byāsattamanasa nara,
anya-e0803n5:267_1: Ettha hi paṭhamādutiyāvibhattīnaṁ ekavacanabahuvacanaṭṭhāne ca tatiyācatutthīchaṭṭhīsattamīnaṁ ekavacanaṭṭhāne ca yathārahaṁ sāgamo bhavati ādesasaravibhattisaraparattā.
anya-e0803n5:267_2: Ayañca nayo sukhumo sādhukaṁ manasi kātabbo.
anya-e0803n5:268_0: Aparo nayo – ‘‘byāsatto mano yassa soyaṁ byāsattamano’’ti evampi puggalāpekkhakassa imassa padassa ‘‘byāsattamano naro, byāsattamanā narā.
anya-e0803n5:268_3: Aparopi nayo – ‘‘byāsatto ca so mano cāti byāsattamano’’ti evaṁ cittāpekkhakassapi imassa padassa ‘‘byāsattamano, byāsattamanā. Byāsattamanaṁ, byāsattamane. Byāsattamanasā,
anya-e0803n5:268_5: ettha pana tatiyācatutthīchaṭṭhīsattamīnaṁ ekavacanaṭṭhāneyeva sāgamo bhavati ādesasaraparattā. Yathā ca ettha,
anya-e0803n5:268_6: evaṁ ‘‘alīnamanaso naro’’tiādīsupi ayaṁ tividho nayo veditabbo.
anya-e0803n5:269_0: Napuṁsakaliṅge pana vattabbe ‘‘byāsattamanasaṁ kulaṁ, byāsattamanāni kulāni. Byāsattamanasaṁ kulaṁ, byāsattamanāni kulāni.
anya-e0803n5:269_2: Ettha pana paṭhamādutiyātatiyācatutthīchaṭṭhīsattamīnaṁ ekavacanaṭṭhāneyeva yathārahaṁ sāgamo bhavati ādesasaravibhattisaraparattā,
anya-e0803n5:269_3: ayampi nayo sukhumo sādhukaṁ manasi kātabbo.
anya-e0803n5:270_0: Itthiliṅge pana vattabbe ‘‘byāsattamanasā itthī’’ti evaṁ paṭhamekavacanaṭṭhāneyeva sāgamaṁ vatvā tato ‘‘byāsattamanā, byāsattamanāyo itthiyo.
anya-e0803n5:271_0: Sotūnaṁ ñāṇappabhedajananatthaṁ aparāpi nāmikapadamālāyo dassayissāma sahanibbacanena – mano eva mānasaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:271_1: samussāhitaṁ mānasaṁ yassa soyaṁ samussāhitamānaso. ‘‘Samussāhitamānaso, samussāhitamānasā. Samussāhitamānasaṁ, samussāhitamānase.
anya-e0803n5:271_3: Sundarā medhā assa atthīti sumedhaso. ‘‘Sumedhaso, sumedhasā. Sumedhasaṁ, sumedhase.
anya-e0803n5:273_0: Kiṁ nu tamhā vippavasi, muhuttamapi piṅgiya;
anya-e0803n5:277_5: Apica loke nīti nāma nānappakārehi kathitā eva sobhati, ayañca sāsane nīti,
anya-e0803n5:280_0: Viseso tesu kesañci, pāḷiyaṁ yo padissati;
anya-e0803n5:286_0: Tatra kānici suttapadāni dassessāma – natthi attakāre, natthi parakāre, natthi purisakāre, pariyantakate saṁsāre, jīve sattame, na hevaṁ vattabbe,
anya-e0803n5:286_1: bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā saṁsaritvā dukkhassantaṁ karissantīti.
anya-e0803n5:287_2: evañca sati ‘thāliyaṁ odanaṁ pacatī’ti ettha viya ādhārasutisambhavato ‘gimhāna māse paṭhamasmiṁ gimhe’ti idaṁ kataratthaṁ jotetī’’ti?
anya-e0803n5:287_3: Te vadeyyuṁ ‘‘na mayaṁ bho ‘vanappagumbeti idaṁ bhummavacana’nti vadāma,
anya-e0803n5:287_4: atha kho ‘paccattavacanassa bhummavacananiddeso’ti vadāmā’’ti. Evampi dosoyeva tumhākaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:287_5: nanu ‘‘saṅghe gotami dehī’’ti etthāpi sampadānavacanassa bhummavacananiddesoti vuttepi saṅghassa dānakriyāya ādhārabhāvato ‘‘saṅghe’’ti vacanaṁ suṇantānaṁ ādhārasuti ca ādhāraparikappo ca hotiyeva.
anya-e0803n5:287_6: Na hi sakkā evaṁ pavattaṁ cittaṁ nivāretuṁ,
anya-e0803n5:287_7: tasmā ettha evaṁ pana viseso gahetabbo ‘‘paccattavacanassapi katthaci bhummavacanassa viya rūpaṁ hotī’’ti.
anya-e0803n5:287_9: Īdisesu hi ṭhānesu niruttippabhedakusalo lokānukampako bhagavā paccattavacanavasena niddisitabbe sati evaṁ aniddisitvā lokassa sammohamuppādayanto viya kathaṁ bhummavacananiddesaṁ karissati,
anya-e0803n5:288_0: Apica tatheva ‘‘attakāre’’ti paccattavacanassa bhummavacananiddese sati ādhārasutisambhavato ‘‘attakārasmiṁ kiñci vatthu natthī’’ti anadhippeto attho siyā,
anya-e0803n5:288_2: ‘‘Upayogabahuvacananiddeso’’ti gahaṇepi upayogatthassa natthisaddena avattabbattā dosoyeva siyā,
anya-e0803n5:288_3: atthisaddādīnaṁ viya pana natthisaddassapi paṭhamāya yogato ‘‘attakāre’’ti idaṁ paccattavacanamevāti viññāyati.
anya-e0803n5:288_4: ‘‘Bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā saṁsaritvā dukkhassantaṁ karissantī’’ti etthāpi paccattavacanassa ‘‘bhummavacananiddeso’’ti vā ‘‘upayogavacananiddeso’’ti vā gahaṇe sati ‘‘bālā ca paṇḍitā cā’’ti ettakampi vattuṁ ajānanadoso siyā,
anya-e0803n5:288_6: Yathā pana niggahītāgamavasenuccārite ‘‘cakkhuṁ udapādī’’ti pade paccattavacanassa ‘‘cakkhuṁ me dehi yācito’’ti ettha upayogavacanena sutivasena samānattepi paccattavacanatthoyeva sotāre paṭibhāti ‘‘udapādī’’tiākhyātena kathitattā,
anya-e0803n5:288_8: ‘‘cakkhuṁ udapādī’’ti hi bhagavatā vuttakāle ko ‘‘cakkhuṁ udapādī’’ti padaṁ parivattitvā atthamācikkhati,
anya-e0803n5:288_9: tathā ‘‘bāle paṇḍite’’tiādīnampi paccattavacanānaṁ aparehi ‘‘bāle paṇḍite’’tiādīhi bhummopayogavacanehi sutivasena samānattepi paccattavacanatthoyeva sotāre paṭibhāti,
anya-e0803n5:288_10: na itaravacanattho yathāpayogaṁ atthassa gahetabbattā. Iti ‘‘vanappagumbe, bāle,
anya-e0803n5:294_0: Imassa kāmanītajātakassa saṁvaṇṇanāyaṁ ‘‘kekake cāti paccatte upayogavacanaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:294_2: Evaṁ vadanto ca so ‘‘purise passati, purise patiṭṭhita’’nti,
anya-e0803n5:294_3: ‘‘passāmi loke sadhane manusse’’ti ca ādīsu yebhuyyena ‘‘purise, loke, sadhane,
anya-e0803n5:294_4: manusse’’tiādīnaṁ upayogabahuvacanabhummekavacanabhāvena āgatattā paccattekavacanabahuvacanabhāvassa pana apākaṭattā yebhuyyappavattiṁ sandhāya ‘‘idampi tādisamevā’’ti maññamāno vadati maññe.
anya-e0803n5:294_5: Ācariyā hi katthaci attano ruciyāpi visuṁ visuṁ kathenti.
anya-e0803n5:294_6: Ayaṁ pana amhākaṁ ruci – ‘‘kekake’’ti idaṁ paccattavacanameva ‘‘pañcālā,
anya-e0803n5:294_8: raṭṭhavācakattā pana ‘‘kuruyo’’ti padamiva bahuvacanavasena vuttaṁ. Na hi bhagavā ‘‘khattiyo, brāhmaṇo,
anya-e0803n5:294_9: vesso’’tiādīsu viya samānavibhattīhi niddisitabbesu sahajātapadesu pacchimaṁ upayogavacanavasena niddiseyya,
anya-e0803n5:294_13: Tathā hi sandhivisodhanavidhāyako ācariyo tādisānaṁ padānaṁ paccattavacanattaññeva vibhāvento sāmaṁ kate pakaraṇe ‘‘vanappagumbo vanappagumbe, sukhaṁ dukkhaṁ jīvo, sukhe dukkhe jīve’’ti āha,
anya-e0803n5:294_14: ṭīkāyampi ca tesaṁ paccattavacanabhāvameva vibhāvento ‘‘vanappagumbo, sukhaṁ, dukkhaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:294_15: jīvo’’ti sādhanīyaṁ rūpaṁ patiṭṭhapetvā niggahītalopavasena akārokārānañca ekārādesavasena ‘‘vanappagumbe, sukhe, dukkhe, jīve’’ti rūpanipphattimāha. Sā pāḷinayānu kūlā.
anya-e0803n5:294_16: Kaccāyanācariyenapi pāḷinayaṁ nissāya ‘‘dvipade tulyādhikaraṇe’’ti paccattabahuvacanapadaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:294_18: ‘‘Dvipade tulyādhikaraṇe’’ti ca idaṁ ‘‘aṭṭha nāgāvāsasatānī’’ti vattabbe ‘‘aṭṭha nāgāvāsasate’’ti padamiva vuccatīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:295_3: ‘‘esese eke ekaṭṭhe’’ti ettha ‘‘esese’’ti imānipi paccatte bhummavacanāni vā siyuṁ, upayogavacanāni vā.
anya-e0803n5:295_8: Iccevaṁ sabbathāpi ‘‘vanappagumbe, bāle, paṇḍite, kekake’’ti, ‘‘viratte kosiyāyane, aṭṭha nāgāvāsasate, ke purise,
anya-e0803n5:295_9: esese’’ti evamādīnaṁ anekesaṁ purisaliṅgaitthiliṅganapuṁsakaliṅgasabbanāmaekavacanaanekavacanavasena sāsanavare ṭhitānaṁ padānaṁ nipphatti paccattekavacanaputhuvacanānamekārādesavaseneva bhavatīti avassamidaṁ sampaṭicchitabbaṁ. Evaṁ ‘‘vanappagumbe, bāle,
anya-e0803n5:295_11: saddhena kulaputtena ācariye payirupāsitvā tadupadesaṁ sakkaccaṁ gahetvā jānitabbā.
anya-e0803n5:295_12: Buddhavacanasmiñhi saddato ca atthato ca adhippāyato ca akkharacintakānaṁ ñāṇacakkhusammuyhanaṭṭhānabhūtā pāḷinayā vividhā dissanti.
anya-e0803n5:296_0: Tattha saddato tāva idaṁ sammuyhanaṭṭhānaṁ – ‘‘virattā kosiyāyanī’’ti vattabbe ‘‘viratte kosiyāyane’’ti itthiliṅgapaccattavacanaṁ dissati,
anya-e0803n5:296_2: ‘‘kinnāmo te upajjhāyo’’ti vattabbe ‘‘konāmo te upajjhāyo’’ti samāsapadaṁ pulliṅgavisayaṁ dissati.
anya-e0803n5:296_3: Kiṁ nāmaṁ etassāti konāmoti hi samāso. Tena ‘‘konāmā itthī,
anya-e0803n5:296_5: ‘‘Kva te balaṁ mahārājā’’ti vattabbe ‘‘ko te balaṁ mahārājā’’ti ettha kvasaddena īsakaṁ samānasutiko sattamiyanto kosaddo dissati,
anya-e0803n5:296_6: kva kosaddā hi aññamaññamīsakasamānasutikā. Tathā ‘‘idha hemantagimhesu, idha hemantagimhisu, na tenatthaṁ abandhi so,
anya-e0803n5:297_0: Atthato pana idaṁ sammuyhanaṭṭhānaṁ – ‘‘yaṁ na kañcanadvepiñcha,
anya-e0803n5:297_1: andhena tamasā gata’’nti ettha nakāro ‘‘kata’’nti iminā sambandhitabbo.
anya-e0803n5:297_3: Ettha hi nakāro upamāne vattati, na paṭisedhe.
anya-e0803n5:303_0: Adhippāyato idaṁ sammuyhanaṭṭhānaṁ – ‘‘taṇhaṁ asmimānaṁ sassatucchedadiṭṭhiyo dvādasāyatananissitaṁ nandirāgañca hantvā brāhmaṇo anīgho yātī’’ti vattabbepi tathā avatvā tamevatthaṁ gahetvā aññena pariyāyena
anya-e0803n5:304_0: ‘‘Mātaraṁ pitaraṁ hantvā, rājāno dve ca khattiye;
anya-e0803n5:305_0: Raṭṭhaṁ sānucaraṁ hantvā, anīgho yāti brāhmaṇo’’ti
anya-e0803n5:307_0: ‘‘Vanaṁ chindatha mā rukkhaṁ, vanato jāyate bhayaṁ;
anya-e0803n5:308_0: Chetvā vanañca vanathaṁ, nibbanā hotha bhikkhavo’’ti
anya-e0803n5:309_1: Evaṁ buddhavacane saddato ca atthato ca adhippāyato ca akkharacintakānaṁ ñāṇacakkhusammuyhanaṭṭhānabhūtā pāḷinayā vividhā dissanti. Yathāha –
anya-e0803n5:311_0: Yebhuyyena hi lokanītividhurā pāṭhe nayā vijjare;
anya-e0803n5:312_0: Paṇḍiccampi pahāya bāhiragataṁ ettheva tasmā budho,
anya-e0803n5:314_2: na sutisāmaññena bhummopayogavacanattaṁ bhummopayogavacanehi tesaṁ samānasutikattepi paccattajotakattā.
anya-e0803n5:314_3: Samānasutikāpi hi saddā atthappakaraṇaliṅgasaddantarābhisambandhādivasena atthavisesajotakā bhavanti. Taṁ yathā?
anya-e0803n5:314_13: Ettha pana kiñcāpi ‘‘devadattaṁ pakkosa ghaṭadhārakaṁ daṇḍadhāraka’’ntiādīsupi ghaṭadaṇḍādīni liṅgaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:315_0: ‘‘Issā uppajjatī’’ti ca ‘‘issā purisamanubandhiṁsū’’ti ca vutte pana sabbathā samānasutikānaṁ saddantarābhisambandhavasena yathāvuttaatthavisesajotanaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0803n5:315_1: Tathā ‘‘sīho bhikkhave migarājā sāyanhasamayaṁ āsayā nikkhamatī’’ti vutte ‘‘migādhipo kesarasīho’’ti viññāyati. ‘‘Sīho samaṇuddeso,
anya-e0803n5:315_2: sīho senāpatī’’ti ca vutte pana ‘‘sīho nāma sāmaṇero,
anya-e0803n5:315_5: ‘‘Addasaṁsu kho chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sattarasavaggiye bhikkhū vihāraṁ paṭisaṅkharonte’’ti evampi saddantarābhisambandhavasena samānasutikānaṁ paccattopayogatthasaṅkhātaatthavisesajotanaṁ bhavati.
anya-e0803n5:315_7: aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavocā’’ti evampi saddantarābhisambandhavasena samānasutikānaṁ ālapanatthapaccattatthasaṅkhātaatthavisesajotanaṁ bhavati,
anya-e0803n5:315_8: tasmā ‘‘vanappagumbe yatha phussitagge’’tiādīni bhummopayogavacanehi sadisattepisaddantarābhisambandhavasena suddhapaccattavacanānīti gahetabbāni.
anya-e0803n5:315_9: Paccattekavacanabahuvacanānaṁ eva hi ekārādesavasena evaṁvidhāni rūpāni bhavanti bhummopayogavacanāni viyāti.
anya-e0803n5:315_10: Nanu ca bho evaṁvidhānaṁ rūpānaṁ pāḷiyaṁ dissanato ‘ekārantampi pulliṅgaṁ atthī’ti vattabbanti? Na vattabbaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:315_12: Ādesavasena hi siddhattā visuṁ ekārantapulliṅgaṁ nāma natthi,
anya-e0803n5:316_0: Keci pana vadeyyuṁ ‘‘yāyaṁ purisasaddanayaṁ gahetvā ‘bhūto, bhūtā.
anya-e0803n5:316_2: tattha catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni rūpāni kimatthaṁ na vuttānī’’ti? Visesadassanatthaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:316_3: Tādisāni hi catutthekavacanarūpāni pāḷinaye porāṇaṭṭhakathānaye ca upaparikkhiyamāne ‘‘gatyatthakammani, nayanatthakammani, vibhattivipariṇāme,
anya-e0803n5:316_4: tadatthe cā’’ti saṅkhepato imesu catūsuyeva ṭhānesu,
anya-e0803n5:316_6: Dānarocanadhāraṇanamoyogādibhede pana yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye na dissanti,
anya-e0803n5:316_7: iti imaṁ visesaṁ dassetuṁ na vuttānīti.
anya-e0803n5:316_8: Nanu dānakriyāyoge ‘‘abhirūpāya kaññā deyyā’’ti catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitarūpadassanato imasmimpi saddanītippakaraṇe ‘‘purisāya, bhūtāyā’’tiādīni vattabbāni,
anya-e0803n5:316_9: evaṁ sante kasmā ‘‘dānarocanadhāraṇanamoyogādibhede pana yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye na dissantī’’ti vuttanti? Apāḷinayattā.
anya-e0803n5:316_10: ‘‘Abhirūpāya kaññā deyyā’’ti ayañhi saddasatthato āgato nayo, na buddhavacanato.
anya-e0803n5:316_11: Buddhavacanañhi patvā ‘‘abhirūpassa kaññā deyyā’’ti padarūpaṁ bhavissatīti.
anya-e0803n5:316_12: Nanu ca bho namoyogādīsupi catutthekavacanassa āyādeso dissatīti.
anya-e0803n5:316_13: Sāsanāvacarāpi hi nipuṇā paṇḍitā ‘‘namo buddhāyā’’tiādīni vatvā ratanattayaṁ vandanti. Keci pana –
anya-e0803n5:323_1: narena dūto pahito narāyā’’ti ca gāthāracanampi kubbantīti? Saccaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:323_2: sāsanāvacarāpi nipuṇā paṇḍitā ‘‘namo buddhāyā’’tiādīnivatvā ratanattayaṁ vandanti, gāthāracanampi kubbanti,
anya-e0803n5:323_3: evaṁ santepi te saddasatthe kataparicayavasena saddasatthato nayaṁ gahetvā tathārūpā gāthāpi cuṇṇiyapadānipi abhisaṅkharonti,
anya-e0803n5:323_5: Ye pana saddasatthe akataparicayā antamaso bāladārakā,
anya-e0803n5:323_6: tepi aññesaṁ vacanaṁ sutvā kataparicayavasena ‘‘namo buddhāyā’’tiādīni vatvā ratanattayaṁ vandanti,
anya-e0803n5:323_8: Katthaci hi padese kumārake akkharasamayaṁ uggaṇhāpentā garū akkharānamādimhi ‘‘namo buddhāyā’’ti sikkhāpenti,
anya-e0803n5:323_10: evaṁ santepi pāḷinaye porāṇaṭṭhakathānaye ca upaparikkhiyamāne ṭhapetvā gatyatthakammādiṭṭhānacatukkaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:323_11: pabhedato sattaṭṭhānaṁ vā dānarocanadhāraṇanamoyogādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni rūpāni na dissanti,
anya-e0803n5:323_13: buddhāya dānaṁ dentī’’ti padāni pāḷiṁ patvā ‘‘namo buddhassa,
anya-e0803n5:323_14: buddhassa dānaṁ dentī’’ti aññarūpāni bhavantīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:323_15: Ayaṁ pana pāḷinayaaṭṭhakathānayānurūpena āyādesassa payogaracanā – ‘‘buddhāya saraṇaṁ gacchati,
anya-e0803n5:323_16: buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchatī’’ti vā, ‘‘buddhāya nagaraṁ nenti,
anya-e0803n5:323_17: buddhaṁ nagaraṁ nentī’’ti vā, ‘‘buddhāya sakkato dhammo,
anya-e0803n5:323_22: buddhasmā apenti aññatitthiyā’’ti vā , ‘‘buddhāya dhammatā, buddhassa dhammatā’’ti vā, ‘‘buddhāya pasanno,
anya-e0803n5:323_23: buddhe pasanno’’ti vā iti pabhedato imaṁ sattaṭhānaṁ vivajjetvā aññattha āyādeso na dissati. Tathā hi –
anya-e0803n5:326_0: Ettha mahānamakkārapāṭho nāma ‘‘namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassā’’ti pāṭho. Atrāpi āyādeso na dissati.
anya-e0803n5:326_1: Vammikasuttepi ‘‘namo karohi nāgassā’’ti evaṁ āyādeso na dissati.
anya-e0803n5:326_2: Ambaṭṭhasuttepi ‘‘sotthi bhadante hotu rañño, sotthi janapadassa’’. Evaṁ āyādeso na dissati.
anya-e0803n5:331_0: Yesaṁ divā ca ratto ca, niccaṁ buddhagatā satī’’ti
anya-e0803n5:332_0: Imissā pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘sammādiṭṭhikassa putto guḷaṁ khipamāno buddhānussatiṁ āvajjetvā ‘namo buddhassā’ti vatvā guḷaṁ khipatī’’ti āyādesavajjito saddaracanāviseso dissati.
anya-e0803n5:332_1: Sagāthāvaggavaṇṇanāyampi dhanañjānīsuttaṭṭhakathāyaṁ ‘‘tvaṁ ṭhitāpi nisinnāpi khipitvāpi kāsetvāpi ‘namo buddhassā’ti tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa namakkāraṁ karosī’’ti āyādesavajjito saddaracanāviseso dissati.
anya-e0803n5:332_2: Tathā tattha tattha ‘‘buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṁ deti.
anya-e0803n5:332_3: Tassa purisassa bhattaṁ na ruccati. Samaṇassa rocate saccaṁ, buddhassa chattaṁ dhāreti,
anya-e0803n5:332_5: Evaṁ dānarocanādīsu bahūsu sampadānavisayesu catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitaṁ rūpaṁ na dissati.
anya-e0803n5:333_2: appo saggāya gacchatī’’ti cettha gatyatthakammani dissati.
anya-e0803n5:333_5: ‘‘Paṭikasseyyā’’ti cettha kasa gatiyanti dhātussa patiupasaggena visesitattā ‘‘ākaḍḍheyyā’’ti attho bhavati.
anya-e0803n5:333_7: yo maṁ gahetvāna dakāya netī’’ti ettha nayanatthakammani dissati. Ettha hi maṁ udakaṁ neti,
anya-e0803n5:333_10: Mama vacanato viramathāti hi nissakkavacanavasena attho.
anya-e0803n5:333_12: Mama mahato haṁsagaṇassa bhattāti hi sāmivacanavasena attho.
anya-e0803n5:333_15: Mayaṁ dhanañcayassa rañño asakkatā ca bhavāmāti hi kattutthe sāmivacanaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:333_16: Tathā hi ‘‘dhanañcayassā’’ti vā ‘‘dhanañcayenā’’ti vā vattabbe evaṁ avatvā ‘‘dhanañcayāyā’’ti sampadānavacanaṁ dānakriyādikassa sampadānavisayassa abhāvato vibhattivipariṇāmeyeva yujjati,
anya-e0803n5:333_17: tasmā dhanañcayarājena mayaṁ asakkatā ca bhavāmāti attho gahetabbo.
anya-e0803n5:334_0: ‘‘Virāgāya upasamāya nirodhāyā’’tiādīni pana anekasahassāni āyādesasahitāni saddarūpāni tadatthe pavattanti.
anya-e0803n5:334_3: na bhavabhogādiattha’’nti tadatthavaseneva āyādesasahitaṁ saddarūpaṁ payuñjiṁsu,
anya-e0803n5:334_4: evaṁ catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni rūpāni gatyatthakammani nayanatthakammani vibhattivipariṇāme tadatthe cāti imesu catūsuyeva ṭhānesu dissanti,
anya-e0803n5:334_5: na pana dānarocanādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye.
anya-e0803n5:334_6: Tathā hi niruttipiṭake ‘‘atthāyāti sampadānavacana’’nti āyādesasahitaṁ saddarūpaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:334_7: purisasaddādivasena pana tādisāni rūpāni na vuttāni tādisānaṁ saddarūpānaṁ yattha katthaci appavattanato.
anya-e0803n5:334_8: Kaccāyanappakaraṇepi hi ‘‘āya catutthekavacanassa tū’’ti lakkhaṇassa vuttiyaṁ ‘‘atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussāna’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:335_0: Ettha siyā – nanu bho tasseva vuttiyaṁ ‘‘catutthīti kimatthaṁ purisassa mukhaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:335_2: Vāti kimatthaṁ dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā’’ti vuttattā ‘‘purisāya samaṇāya brāhmaṇāyā’’tiādīni padarūpāni nayato dassitāni,
anya-e0803n5:335_3: kevalaṁ pana mukhasaddayogato bahuvacanabhāvato vikappanato ca ‘‘purisāyā’’tiādīni na sijjhanti,
anya-e0803n5:335_5: Ettha vuccate – ‘‘catutthīti kimatthaṁ purisassa mukha’’nti vadanto ‘‘sace āyādeso bhaveyya , catutthiyā eva bhavati,
anya-e0803n5:335_7: na ca tena ‘‘mukhasaddaṭṭhāne detītiādike sampadānavisayabhūte kriyāpade ṭhite āyādeso hotī’’ti dasseti.
anya-e0803n5:335_8: ‘‘Ekavacanassāti kimatthaṁ purisānaṁ dadātī’’ti vadantopi ‘‘ekavacanasseva āyādeso hoti, na bahuvacanassā’’ti dasseti.
anya-e0803n5:335_9: ‘‘Dadātī’’ti idaṁ padaṁ ‘‘purisāna’’nti padassa sampadānavacanattaṁ ñāpetuṁ avoca,
anya-e0803n5:335_10: na ca ‘‘detītiādike sampadānavisayabhūte kriyāpade sati catutthekavacanassa āyādeso hotī’’ti imamatthaṁ viññāpeti.
anya-e0803n5:335_11: ‘‘Vāti kimatthaṁ dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā’’ti ca vadantopi ‘‘sampadāneyeva vikappena āyādeso hotī’’ti viññāpeti,
anya-e0803n5:336_0: Yadi pana dānādikriyaṁ paṭicca āyādesavidhānaṁ siyā,
anya-e0803n5:336_1: vuttikārakena lakkhaṇassa vuttiyaṁ mūlodāharaṇeyeva ‘‘atthāya hitāyā’’ti tadatthapayogāni viya ‘‘purisāya dīyate’’tiādi vattabbaṁ siyā, na ca vuttaṁ. Kasmāti ce?
anya-e0803n5:336_2: Buddhavacane porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu ca tādisassa payogassa abhāvā.
anya-e0803n5:336_3: Niruttipiṭake hi pabhinnapaṭisambhido so āyasmā mahākaccāno ‘‘purisassa dīyate’’ti āyādesarahitāniyeva rūpāni dasseti,
anya-e0803n5:336_4: ‘‘atthāyāti sampadānavacana’’nti bhaṇantopi ca thero dānādikriyāpekkhaṁ akatvā catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitaṁ rūpameva niddisi.
anya-e0803n5:336_6: Iti imehi kāraṇehi jānitabbaṁ ‘‘dānādikriyaṁ paṭicca āyādesavidhānaṁ na kata’’nti.
anya-e0803n5:336_7: Yajjevaṁ ‘‘atthāya hitāyā’’tiādīniyeva tadatthappayogāni ‘‘āya catutthekavacanassa tū’’ti lakkhaṇassa visayā bhaveyyuṁ, nāññānīti? Tanna, aññānipi visayāyeva tassa. Katamāni? ‘‘Mūlāya paṭikasseyya, appo saggāya gacchati, dakāya neti,
anya-e0803n5:337_0: Nanu ca bho evaṁ sante vuttikārakena mūlodāharaṇesu ‘‘atthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanussāna’’nti vatvā ‘‘mūlāya paṭikasseyyā’’tiādīnipi vattabbāni,
anya-e0803n5:337_1: kimudāharaṇe pana ‘‘vāti kimatthaṁ saggassa gamanena vā’’ti vattabbanti? Saccaṁ, avacane kāraṇamatthi,
anya-e0803n5:337_4: saggāyā’’ti padāni suddhasampadānavacanāni na honti gatyatthakammani vattanato,
anya-e0803n5:337_6: Tathā ‘‘dakāya netī’’ti ettha ‘‘dakāyā’’ti padaṁ nayanatthakammani vattanato suddhasampadānavacanaṁ na hotīti na vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:337_7: ‘‘Viramathāyasmanto mama vacanāyā’’ti ettha pana ‘‘vacanāyā’’ti padaṁ nissakkavacanatthe vattanato,
anya-e0803n5:337_9: ‘‘asakkatā casma dhanañcayāyā’’ti ettha ‘‘dhanañcayāyā’’ti padaṁ kattuvasena sāmiatthe vattanato suddhasampadānavacanaṁ na hotīti na vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:337_10: Kimudāharaṇepi ‘‘saggassā’’ti padaṁ gamanasaddasannidhānato gatyatthakammani vattanato suddhasampadānavacanaṁ na hotīti ‘‘vāti kimatthaṁ saggassa gamanena vā’’ti na vuttaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:337_11: Evañhettha vuttanayena buddhavacanaṁ porāṇaṭṭhakathānayañca patvā catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni rūpāni gatyatthakammādīsu catūsuyeva ṭhānesu dissanti,
anya-e0803n5:337_12: na pana dānarocanādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisayeti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0803n5:338_0: Nanu ca bho ‘‘candanasāraṁ jeṭṭhikāya adāsi suvaṇṇamālaṁ kaniṭṭhāyā’’ti dānappayoge catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitarūpadassanato ‘‘rājakaññāya dīyate,
anya-e0803n5:338_1: rājakaññāya ruccati alaṅkāro, rājakaññāya chattaṁ dhāreti, rājakaññāya namo karohi, rājakaññāya sotthi bhavatu,
anya-e0803n5:338_3: atha kasmā ‘‘buddhavacanaṁ porāṇaṭṭhakathānayañca patvā catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni rūpāni gatyatthakammādīsu catūsuyeva ṭhānesu dissanti,
anya-e0803n5:338_4: na pana dānarocanādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye’’ti vadathāti? Uppathamavatiṇṇo bhavaṁ,
anya-e0803n5:338_5: na hi bhavaṁ amhākaṁ vacanatthaṁ jānāti.
anya-e0803n5:338_6: Ayañhettha amhākaṁ vacanattho – sabbānipi itthiliṅgāni ekavacanavasena tatiyācatutthīpañcamīchaṭṭhīsattamīṭhānesu samasamāni honti, appāni asamāni,
anya-e0803n5:338_7: tasmā tāni ṭhapetvā pulliṅganapuṁsakaliṅgesu purisādi cittādisaddānaṁ akārantapakatibhāve ṭhitānaṁ catutthekavacanassa āyādesasahitāni rūpāni buddhavacanādīsu dānarocanādibhede yattha katthaci sampadānavisaye na dissanti. Teneva hi ‘‘mūlāya, saggāya, dakāya, vacanāya,
anya-e0803n5:338_9: nibbānāyā’’ti evamādīni pana anekasatāni tiliṅgapadāni tadattheyevāti imesu catūsu ṭhānesu dissanti. ‘‘Deti, rocati,
anya-e0803n5:338_10: dhāretī’’tiādīsu pana suddhasampadānavisayesu na dissanti. Bhavanti catra –
anya-e0803n5:361_0: Iti navaṅge sāṭṭhakathe piṭakattaye byappathagatīsu viññūnaṁ
